He has spent his all savings to buy cast iron for manufacturing spare parts and does not have cash in hand to fix the lathe machine.

Therefore, Nargis has requested a loan for her husband so he can fix the deficiencies of the lathe machine and can buy new tools to work with the lathe machine. She is relaxed now, because her husband will be able to easily operate his lathe machine again. She is very thankful to Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to enable her husband fix the lathe machine and buy spare parts.

loans.name: Rizwana

texts.en:
Rizwana is 34-year-old lady; she is married and spends her life with her two daughters and her spouse in the area of Lahore, Pakistan.

She is taking out a loan for her husband because her owns an embroidery materials shop. He has been selling embroidery materials for many years. He sells sequins, pearls, thread, precious stones, silk, needles and wooden frames for embroidery. The embroidery material for bridal dresses is very expensive but its turnover very high. 

Due to the high cost, he is facing a shortage of materials and is unable to purchase expensive raw materials to sell. Therefore, Rizwana has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan so that her husband can reduce the shortage of embroidery materials. With this amount he will buy stocks of thread,  fancy cloth, sequins, precious stones and pearls of various colors.

Rizwana is very thankful to Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy stocks of thread, fancy cloth, sequins, precious stones and pearls of various colors to resell from their shop.

loans.name: Familia Unida Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama Familia Unida está en su ciclo número 4° Del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 7 de ellas se encuentran por debajo de la línea de la pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Claudelina, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel 2, es decir, está en un nivel medio, donde entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que hace elementos de limpieza y también es empleada, y por medio de estos trabajos lucha por poder salir adelante. 
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de elementos de limpieza para la venta, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir con su trabajo, luchando por su familia y sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
The group called “Familia Unida” (United Family) is in its fourth loan cycle with the Women’s Committee Program. All of the members are working and helping one another move forward. They have taken the poverty elimination survey and the results indicated that seven members are below the poverty line.

One of the members is Sra. Claudelina. Her latest survey indicated that she is at a Stage 2 poverty level, which is mid-level. Her work involves making cleaning products. She is also employed, so through these jobs, she is able to forge ahead.

Claudelina is requesting a loan so that she can invest in cleaning supplies to sell. This will enable her to continue working and striving on behalf of her family and loved ones.

loans.use: to buy cleaning supplies to sell.

loans.name: Bahmal

texts.en:
Bahmal lives in a house which is in bad condition. She lives in this house with her 4 children and her husband. Bahmal is a woman with a higher education. For more than 10 years, she has worked in a local school as a teacher. Her husband is a farmer. He grows and sells vegetables. Bahmal’s elder son is a migrant in Russia. 

She is going to buy slate to repair the roof of her house because when it rains water flows in from the roof. She is asking for a loan of 2,500 Somoni to buy slate. This loan will help her improve her living conditions and boost the family's morale. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy slate to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Ernesto Jr.

texts.en:
Ernesto is 26 years old, single and lives in Pari-an, Enrique Villanueva. As he has a desire to earn, he decided to raise pigs on his own. Through Paglaum MPC he obtained the capital to purchase his original piglets and feed. 

Now, he is requesting a loan to buy additional feed. He really hopes and prays that his business will grow.  Someday, he wants to be meat supplier to the neighborhood.

loans.use: To buy additional bags of feeds.

loans.name: Mary Lord

texts.en:
Mary Lord is 41 years old, married and work hard to help her husband earn an income.

She is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Mary Lord requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Mary Lord has been raising pigs for 3 years now, and has borrowed 7 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Mary Lord would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Ester

texts.en:
As a married mother of nine children, who are all in school. Ester works hard to support her family.

She has a food-vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising livestock.  Ester is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food-vending business.

Ester has been sustaining her business activities through her past 16 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Mirasol

texts.en:
Mirasol works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy-and-sell vegetables business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional vegetables to sell.

Mirasol has been in this business for three years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Senthamarai Shg - Udaiyarpalayam Group

texts.en:
Senthamarai is a group of 19 women led by Latha (featured borrower holding a board with the SHG group's name). She and her group members are on a mission to make a small but important change to their way of living. They all hail from Udaiyarpalayam a small village in Ariyalur district, Tamil Nadu. These women use traditional stoves for cooking in their homes. The noxious smoke and particulate matter that emanate from the stove are the main causes of many respiratory illnesses. Their children often complain of breathlessness and their husbands’ productive years, not to mention their own, are reduced because of ill health.

Fortunately for these women, improved design and technology offers an alternative cook-stove which employs an efficient combustion process to reduce the smoke and hazards associated with the traditional cook-stoves. These women are requesting a loan to buy these stoves. Your contribution will help them make a wise and necessary investment in a healthy future.

loans.use: to buy an efficient cook-stove.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy zinc sheeting for the house that she is building.

loans.name: Florenda

texts.en:
Florenda, a 50-year-old married mother of seven, works hard to provide for her family. For seven years she has run a general store in the Philippines, and also earns an income from farming rice and selling bananas.

Florenda, who has borrowed and repaid 16 previous loans from NWTF,  has requested a new one for PHP 23000 to purchase more items to sell such as canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc. She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell such as canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc

loans.name: Bashiran

texts.en:
Bashiran is 49 years old, married and a mother of five children. Her husband is a driver by profession and for many years has been providing transportation services using his three wheeled rickshaw. Given their big family, he has to work really hard to make ends meet. 

Currently his rickshaw needs maintenance due to constant usage. Its timely repair and maintenance is important, as it is the family's only source of income. That is why Bashiran has requested this loan through Brac Pakistan.

loans.use: To pay for her husband's rickshaw repair and maintenance

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina is a housewife, her husband is a security guard and she has two children.

Now she is requesting a loan of $ 800 to improve her business. She will use the loan to buy some additional supplies to keep in her kiosk such as sugar, coffee, shampoo, detergent and other goods. Regina opened her kiosk in 2010 with her own working capital of $ 25.00. 

She is happy with the loan that was offered by Tuba Rai Metin as it will help her to have more working capital to buy more goods. With the loan that she got from Tuba Rai Metin, she will improve her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy sugar, coffee, detergent, shampoo and other goods.

loans.name: Bashiran's Group

texts.en:
Bashiran is the age of 49; she has seven children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband is a scrap dealer by profession. He purchases scrap iron, plastic accessories, aluminum, and copper from the retailers or hawkers and sells it to recycling factories. He has been doing the same business for many years and earns a reasonable profit for his family. He loves his children a lot and wants to provide them better facilities and education. He wants to earn the maximum income to ensure and secure the better future of his children. 

Recently he met with a new retailer who has recycling material in large quantity, which is beyond his purchasing capacity. Therefore, Bashiran has requested a loan for her husband so he can be able to buy scrap material.

Bashiran hopes that this loan will enhance her husband’s earning capacity. In this way, he would be able to make savings more than earlier.

Bashiran seems very glad after receiving this loan, and thanks Kiva.

loans.use: to buy scrap goods for reselling to the recycling factories.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.en:
Sofia is married with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 39 years old, and two of her children are in school.

She has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. Sofia has been in this business for ten years. She requested a PHP 21,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase sacks of rice to sell.

In the future, Sofia would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy vegetables, flour, butter, crops, etc. for widening the assortment of dishes she offers.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.en:
Trinidad is 52 years old and married with nine children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Trinidad has a food vending business in the Philippines. Trinidad requested a PHP 18,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Trinidad has been in this business for 20 years. In the future, Trinidad would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Emelyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Emelyn works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell vegetables business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling charcoal. She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Emelyn is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy vegetables to sell in her food stall for her vegetables business.

Emelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy vegetables to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Gene

texts.en:
Gene is 39 years old and married with eleven children, five of her children are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Gene has a fishing business in the Philippines. Gene requested a 11,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF in order to buy fishing nets and other equipment.

Gene has been in this business for 18 years. In the future, Gene would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and other equipment.

loans.name: La Tolita Group

texts.es:
Doña OLIN tiene 52 años de edad vive con sus hijos y 4 nietos de quien es apoderada desde que fallecio una de sus hijas.
desde hace mas de 4 años, se dedica a su pequeño negocio de heladeria casera, vente ropa de niños y ahora tiene una pequeña tienda todos sus nietos estudian y estan registrados como hijos de ella.

con el credito anterior compro pollos pequeños para criarlos y luego venderlos en su tienda.
con el presente credito, ella comprara gaseosas - arroz - azucar - aceites - atun - panela - y otros articulos para surtir mejor su pequeña tienda y a futuro tenerla mas grande y poder satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes.

Doña OLIN se ha preparado como guia turistica de Majagual donde se encuentran los manglares mas altos del mundo y todos en su comunidad la conocen como una mujer trabajadora y de muchas ideas de innovación.
texts.en:
Olin, age 52, lives with her children and four grandchildren, who are under her care since one of her daughters died.

For over four years she has had a business selling homemade ice cream and children’s clothes.  She now has a small store.  All of her grandchildren go to school, and they are registered as her children.

She used the previous loan to buy small chickens to raise and then sell at her store.  She will use the current loan to buy soft drinks, rice, sugar, cooking oil, tuna, brown sugar, and other items to better stock her small store.  In the future she will have a bigger store and be able to meet the needs of her customers.

Olin has been trained as a tour guide in Majagual.  This is where the tallest mangroves in the world are found.  Everyone in her community knows her as a hard-working woman with a lot of innovative ideas.

loans.use: to buy basic needs products to stock her store.

loans.name: Kausar

texts.en:
Kausar is a 38-year-old married woman. Her financial condition is not good and she has to think many times to start any task. Her husband has been driving a moto-rickshaw (a type of three-wheeled rickshaw powered by motorbike). This rickshaw is being driven over local roads and for small distances. Its engine has become too weak (not powerful enough to bear excess loads or carry passengers).

Now the moto-rickshaw’s engine needs to be maintained. Because it is the only source of income for his family, he wants to fix the problem, but due to lack of available funds, he is unable to do so. Therefore, Kausar has requested a loan so her husband can fix the moto-rickshaw and can drive it smoothly.

Kausar thanks Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of her husband's moto-rickshaw.

loans.name: Franz Jimmy

texts.es:
Franz es un hombre joven de 20 años de edad, soltero sin hijos y su negocio es el comercio de ganado.
Él es emprendedor, enérgico, organizado, inteligente, responsable y muy trabajador. Su negocio lo realiza en la comunidad de Batallas provincia Los Andes, del departamento de La Paz-Bolivia, contextualizado por un ambiente de fuertes amenazas de origen meteorológico, que afectan severamente la producción al menos uno de cada cuatro años. Los productores rurales carecen prácticamente de servicios de asistencia técnica y de innovación, por lo que solamente tienen acceso a fuentes de información tradicionales y gestión de conocimientos productivos a partir de observaciones del contexto natural y experimentación local.
Franz es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, estatura mediana, su lengua materna es el aymara la cual utiliza para el comercio del pueblo, y habla español por la necesidad de estudiar. Su negocio es el comercio de animales de granja que importa desde países y comunidades vecinas. A pesar de que su comunidad es de pocos habitantes el comercio de ganado vacuno mejorado es ofertado y comercializado en pocas horas, cada ejemplar entre vacas y toros es vendido para el faeneo.
Él sueña mejorar su calidad de vida generando mejores ingresos económicos, y piensa que realizando una carrera técnica en su rubro logrará cumplir sus sueños. Su necesidad básica es la compra de una laptop para terminar sus estudios.
Es por esos motivos que Franz solicita un préstamo para la compra de una laptop para terminar sus estudios y cumplir sus sueños.
texts.en:
Franz is a young man, who is 20 years old and is a bachelor without children. His business is cattle.

He is enterprising, energetic, organized, intelligent, responsible, and very hard working. His business is located in the community of Batallas in the province of Los Andes in the department of La Paz, Bolivia. The business is set in an environment with major weather-related threats, which severely affect the production at least once every four years. The rural producers lack technical assistance and innovation services, since they only have access to traditional sources of information and production knowledge through observations of the setting and local experimentation. 

Franz has brown skin, short black hair, and medium height. His native language is Aymara, which is used for business in the town, and he speaks Spanish which is necessary to study. His business is the trade of farm animals, which he imports from neighboring countries and communities. Because his community has few inhabitants, the cattle trade business is offering for sale and marketing the cattle in a few hours, each animal is sold for work. 

His dream is to improve his quality of life by earning a better income, and he think that pursuing a technical career will help him achieve his dreams. His basic necessary is purchasing a laptop to finish his studies. 

It is for these reasons that Franz is requesting a loan to buy a laptop to finish his education and achieve his dreams.

loans.use: to buy a laptop to complete his education and achieve his dreams.

loans.name: Mónica Edith

texts.es:
La Señora Mónica forma parte del grupo de crédito María Reina de la Paz, este hermoso grupo siempre le brinda alegrías ya que en cada reunión se encuentra con sus amigas, así como los créditos le ayudan a mejora la estabilidad económica de su hogar. Vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, es una ciudad que tiene una riqueza arquitectónica y obras artísticas que le hicieron merecedora del nombramiento como Patrimonio Cultural del la Humanidad. 
La Señora. Mónica tiene 39 años de edad, está casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 21, 18, 14 y 11 años, su primer hijo trabaja y le ayuda económicamente, su segundo hijo está estudiando en la universidad, su tercer hijo está en el colegio y su ultimo hijo se encuentra en la escuela, su esposo labora en un taller de aluminio y vidrio, la casa en la que viven es  propia.
Doña Mónica se dedica al arreglo de locales para todo evento social, actividad que la realiza desde hace varios años, pero en casa se dedica a la atención de su tienda.
 El dinero de su crédito va ha invertir en la compra de víveres para su tienda. Su meta es estudiar belleza y tener su propio local.
texts.en:
Mónica is part of the María Reina de la Paz group.  This lovely group always brings her joy because she sees her friends at each meeting.  The loans help her to improve her household’s financial stability.

She lives in the city of Cuenca.  It is a city that has a wealth of architecture and artistic works that made it deserving of being named a Cultural World Heritage Site.

Mónica, age 39, is married, and they have four children, ages 21, 18, 14, and 11.  His first child works and helps her financially.  Her second child attends the university.  Her third child is in high school, and her fourth child is in elementary school.  Her husband works in an aluminum and glass shop.  They live in their own house.

Mónica makes the arrangements for the sites of all types of social events.  She has been engaged in this business activity for several years.  At home she tends to her store.

She will use the loan to buy provisions for her store.  Her goal is to study beauty and to have her own place.

loans.use: to buy food.

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia is 53 years old and married with five children, four of whom are in school. Letecia works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a direct-selling Avon products business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of lotion and other beauty products to sell.

Letecia has been in this business for 10 years. 

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of lotion and other beauty products to sell

loans.name: Harris

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Harris works hard to support his family.

He has a buy and sell spices and vegetables business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from a general store. Harris is borrowing PHP 29,500 through NWTF to buy more stocks of spices and vegetables to sell for his buy and sell spices and vegetables business.

He successfully paid back his previous loan and now has requested an additional loan to further build his business.

Harris has been sustaining his business activities through the past 20 loans from NWTF. He hopes that his hard work will help him attain his dream to save enough money so he can afford to send his children to college .

loans.use: to buy additional stocks to sell.

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en:
Cecelia is 47 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by farming bananas in the Philippines. Cecelia is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Cecelia has been farming bananas for 4 years and also earns additional income from selling them.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Eva Sandri

texts.es: Eva de 20 años, siempre ha estado rodeada de su tia de quien aprendió a desarrollar las actividades comerciales que hoy en dia realiza. Cuando  Eva estudiaba y necesitaba fuentes de ingresos, ella decidió dedicarse a lo que habia aprendido . Fue así como incursionó en la venta de prendas, como collares, anillos y aretes a crédito, trabajando desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche, en la comercialización de estos articulos a la comunidad y en la actividad de compras,en el centro de la ciudad, para servir al mercado,   donde los encuentra a un buen precio. Su meta es mejorar sus ingreos e incrmentar su calidad de vida, mientras su mayor desafio es lograr fuentes de finaciamiento  que le faciliten el cumplimiento de sus metas. En la actualidad está aplicando a un creidkiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará accesorios, que tiene encargados con el fin de mejorar sus inventarios y así mismo apuntarle al mejoramiento de su negocio .
texts.en:
Eva is 20 years old and has always been around her aunt, from whom she learned to run the business she now has. Eva was studying and needed sources of income; she decided to make a living from what she had learned. That was how she got into selling jewelry like necklaces, rings and earrings on credit, working from 8 o'clock in the morning until 8 o'clock at night selling these items to the community and buying them in the center of the city to serve the market where they're found at a good price. 

Her goal is to improve her quality of life, while her greatest challenge is finding sources of financing that will enable her to meet her goals. She is currently applying for a Kiva Loan, the first financing she has gotten from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, with which she will buy accessories she has ordered in order to improve her inventory and likewise aim to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy accessories

loans.name: Geoconda Elizabeth

texts.es: Geoconda sigue con los planes que empezó hace algunos años, y éstos eran poder mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia. Debido a los bajos ingresos que tiene, y a que es madre soltera, los créditos a los que puede accesar son de monto pequeño, es por eso que las mejoras las ha ido haciendo poco a poco. Con este nuevo crédito embaldosará el piso de su vivienda, para lo que comprará cemento, tierra, arena. Tiene un hijo de 18 años quien es discapacitado, no puede caminar y no tiene silla de ruedas, por lo que su movilización es arrastrándose por el suelo. Está ahorrando para poder comprar la silla de rueda de su hijo.
texts.en:
Geoconda continues with the plans that she began some years ago, and these were to improve the conditions of her family’s life. Because of her low income and the fact that she is a single mother, the loans for small amounts that she can access are the reason that she has been able to make improvements little by little. 

With this new loan, she will tile the floor of her home, for which she will buy cement, soil, and sand. 

She has an 18-year-old son, who is disabled; he cannot walk and doesn’t have a wheelchair, which would help him move himself across the floor. She is saving to be able to buy a wheelchair for her son.

loans.use: to tile the floor of her home.

loans.name: Sabougnouma Group

texts.fr:
Mariée  uniquement dans des ménages polygamiques, les cinq membres du groupe Sabougnouma ont en moyenne 35 ans et 4 enfants. Elles habitent toutes à Banconi-Flabougou l’un des quartiers de Bamako et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage et de leurs activités génératrices de revenu à Banconi-Flabougou. Les membres du groupe font le petit commerce de, pagnes wax, encens et parures. Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont décidé de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 4ème  cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Selikenè (femme assise à l’extrême droite sur la photo) est une grande vendeuse de pagnes wax. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 250  pièces de pagnes wax en gros à Bamako. La revente se fait en détails à Banconi-Flabougou et en ambulant à une clientèle composée majoritairement de femmes. Madame Selikenè compte avoir avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 125 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et satisfaire les petits besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
The five members of the Sabougnouma group are married and all living in polygamous families. On the average, they are 35 years of age, with four children. They all live in Banconi-Flabougou, a neighborhood of the city of Bamako and know each other as neighbors as well as through their work. The group members work as vendors selling traditional wax "pagnes" fabric, incense and ornaments. With the goal of bolstering their working capital, the group members have decided to collaborate with Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their fourth solidarity loan. 

Mrs. Selikenè (the one seated in the far right in the photo) is a major vendor of wax "pagnes." She plans to user her loan to buy 250 sets of wax "pagnes" wholesale in Bamako. She sells retail in Banconi Flabougou and as an itinerant vendor, to a customer base composed mainly of women. Thanks to this loan, Mrs. Selikenè plans to earn an average monthly revenue of 125,000 West African francs, which will be used to reinvest in her business and provide for some minor household necessities.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Nelson

texts.en: Nelson, who is 47 years old, is a driver. He operates a motorcycle for transportation services. His wife helps him with his work. They have children who are gradually becoming involved in their business, since at their age, they won't be able to continue working a lot longer. They need rest. Nelson and his wife have been hardworking people who keep working and persevering. Nelson requests this loan to repair a transport vehicle used in the business in order to keep working as he has been. He thanks GDMPC for their support and says that one of his dearest wishes is for his business to prosper every day so he can continue supporting his children.

loans.use: to repair a transport vehicle used in the business.

loans.name: Kevin

texts.en:
Kevin resides in Panduma, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur with his family. He has been running a general store for many years and he is earning good income from this. His previous loan used for the business was repaid successfully. He finds ways to augment their living. Recently, he took a new loan to purchase additional grocery goods to sell.

He hopes to earn more income and use it to improve the general living situation of his family in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery goods to sell.

location.town: Panduma Sr. Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is 48 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Judith is borrowing PHP 7,000 through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Judith has been in pig fattening for 4 years and also earns additional income from fish vending.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream which is to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Analyn works hard to support her family.

She has a farming rice business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of fertilizers for her farming rice business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Analyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 12 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of fertilizers.

loans.name: Ufundi Group

texts.fr: Madame Munyerenkana est présidente du groupe de crédit Ufundi. Agée de 57 ans, elle est  mère de 10 enfants empruntant tous le chemin de l’école et mariée à un agent de l’Etat congolais. Commerçante depuis 1986 au marché central de la ville, elle sollicite ce nouveau crédit pour acheter 3 douzaines de souliers. Son objectif est de scolariser ses enfants et leur garantir une vie meilleure au travers le revenu de son crédit. Au final, la cliente remercie Hekima et ses partenaires.
texts.en: Ms. Munyerenkana is the president of the loan group “Ufundi”. She is 47 years old and a mother of ten children, all pursuing schooling. She is married to a representative of the Congolese government. A merchant since 1986 at the town’s central market, she is requesting this new loan to purchase 3 dozen shoes. Her goal is to provide education to her children and guarantee a better life for them with the revenues from her loan. In conclusion, she thanks Hekima and its partners.

loans.use: to purchase 3 dozen shoes

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma appreciates the previous loan that helped her expand her business.

Fatuma operates a grocery vegetables selling stall. She sells at the market to town dwellers and neighbors. She faces a challenge of high cost of transportation to her place of operation. She dreams of expanding and establishing a wholesale business in the future. 

With the KES 30,000, she wants to pay school fees and purchase vegetables for resale at a profit. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to pay school fees and purchase vegetables for resale at a profit.

loans.name: Baraka Group

texts.fr: La cliente Neema est une femme entrepreneur présidente de l’association d’affaire Baraka. Elle est âgée de 49 ans, mère de 8 enfants et mariée à un homme sans emploie.  Elle est vendeuse au marché central depuis 1990 raison pour laquelle elle sollicite un nouveau prêt pour acheter 2 sacs de haricots, 2 sacs de sucre, 2 sacs riz et 5 bidons d’huile. Son objectif est d’agrandir son entreprise, nourrir ses enfants et les scolariser. Afin, elle remercie Hekima et prie Dieu de le bénir.
texts.en: This client, Neema, is a woman entrepreneur and the president of the business association “Baraka”. She is 49 years old and a mother of eight, and she is married to an unemployed man. She has been a vendor at the central market since 1990, thus she is requesting a new loan to purchase 2 sacks of beans, 2 bags of sugar, 2 sacks of rice, and 5 containers of oil. Her goal is to expand her enterprise and provide food and schooling to her children. And so, she thanks Hekima and prays for God’s blessings on it.

loans.use: to purchase 2 sacks of beans, 2 bags of sugar, 2 sacks of rice, and 5 containers of oil

loans.name: Rahila

texts.en:
Rahila is a 40-year old married woman, living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of five children.

Her husband provides whitewash and oil paint services to his customers in the community. Sometimes he has to go out of city also. Her husband sits on the front of a paint dealer's shop so that he can easily find a new customer and sometimes he does not find any customer. 

Her husband got a new contract for whitewash and oil paint of a newly constructed house, but he has no paint brush or rollers for white wash.

Rahila has requested a loan so that her husband will be able to buy new paint brushes, rollers, kerosene oil, etc.

Her husband’s savings are very poor that is why he is unable to buy new tools for providing whitewash services. She wants to change this condition of her family and hopes that this loan will prove beneficial for her husband.

She is very thankful to Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy new paint brushes, rollers, kerosene oil, etc.

loans.name: Zaida Lucia

texts.es:
Los números son la pasión para Zaida, una joven de 30 años quien no ha soltado el sueño de convertirse en una contadora pública con énfasis en finanzas. Poco a poco ha ido caminando para culminar sus estudios, ahora está en el quinto y último año de la licenciatura en Contaduría pública y finanzas del turno dominical. Su meta es aprender todo lo necesario para llegar a ser una profesional de éxito.
Zaida relata que eligió esta carrera no solo por su pasión, sino también por la gran gama de oportunidades de empleos que le ofrece y de los cuales está más que interesada en desempeñarse. No obstante, primero quiere culminar con sus estudios por lo que necesita de un préstamo para pagar la mensualidad de su universidad. Ella cuenta con el apoyo de sus hermanos, de sus padres y de un tutor quien la ayudará a pagar con su trabajo como recepcionista de un hotel. ¡Ayuda a Zaida a convertirse en la mejor contadora pública!
texts.en: Numbers are Zaida's passion. She is a young 30-year-old woman who has not given up her dream of becoming a public accountant with an emphasis on finance. Little by little she has been progressing to complete her studies. Currently, she is in the 5th and final year of her licensure in public accounting and finance that she completes during Sunday courses. Her goal is to learn all that she needs to become a successful professional. Zaida told us that she chose this profession not only because of her passion, but also because of the wide range of employment opportunities that is offers which she is very interested in pursuing. However, first she wants to complete her studies. Because of this she needs a loan to pay the tuition for her university. She has the support of her brothers, her parents and a tutor who she will help pay with her job as a hotel receptionist. Please help Zaida to become the best public accountant!

loans.use: to pay her university tuition.

loans.name: Nazia

texts.en:
Nazia is a 28-year old married woman, living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of a daughter and seven sons. 

Nazia has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan for her husband. Her husband is a shoemaker by profession. He has been making shoes since his childhood. This is the reason he has gotten lots of experience about his profession. He makes shoes by hand and his handmade shoes are very famous in his hometown. Previously, he provided only services to his clients for shoemaking but now he has gotten lot of market experience and wants to buy raw material for his own shoemaking so that he can generate maximum income.
 
Nazia wants to construct her house, provide better education to her children and establish the business of her husband.

She is very thankful to Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy raw material for making shoes.

loans.name: Filomena

texts.en: Filomena is requesting a loan of $ 600.00 to improve her business. She will use the loan to buy some additional supplies to keep in her kiosk such as slippers, candies, detergent, hard drinks and other things to sell. Filomena opened her kiosk in 2010 with her own working capital of $ 150.00. She has two children. She is happy with the loan offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more goods.

loans.use: to buy slippers, candies, detergent and hard drinks.

loans.name: Deyvi De Los Santos

texts.es: Deyvi está solicitando crédito nuevamente esta vez con el objetivo de empezar la construcción de su cocina, y de esta manera ir avanzando poco a poco en el mejoramiento total de su vivienda, ya que su mayor deseo es poder darle a su esposa e hija una vida digna, y una casa bonita donde vivir. Todavía sigue trabajando como supervisor de una gasolinera. Con este crédito empezará la construcción de su cocina, ya que actualmente no la tiene separada de la sala de su vivienda.
texts.en: Deyvi is asking for another loan, this time with the objective of starting the construction of his kitchen. In this way he will move forward bit by bit with the complete improvement of his home, as his greatest desire is to be able to give his wife and daughter a dignified life and a pretty house to live in. He is still working as a supervisor at a gas station. With this loan he will start the construction of his kitchen, as currently it is not separated from the living room.

loans.use: to build a kitchen for his home

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos es una persona muy responsable, tiene 37 años de edad, es casado y vive en Vista Alegre junto a su familia. Es una persona muy luchadora, siempre se esfuerza en todo lo que hace para poder brindarles mayores oportunidades a su familia. Por iniciativa propia y con algunos ahorros que tenía decidió abrir su negocio de carpintería, hoy le va muy bien porque brinda excelentes trabajos y es muy trabajador e innovador.
Carlos está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá comprar herramientas de trabajo como brocas, cepillo de madera, madera, entre otros para de esta manera poder ofrecer productos con mejores acabados y tener mayores ingresos. Gracias a esto seguirá esforzándose para sacar adelante a su familia y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carlos is a very responsible person. He is 37 years old, is married, and lives in Vista Alegre with his family. He is a very determined person. He always makes an effort in everything he does so that he can make better opportunities available to his family. Through his own initiative and with some savings that he had, he decided to open a carpentry business. Today, it is going very well because he has provided excellent work and is very hard-working and innovative.

Carlos is very thankful for the Kiva loans because the support has allowed him to be able to buy work tools, such as drill bits, wood brushes, and wood, among other things. In this way, he is able to offer products with better finishes and to earn more income. Thanks to this, he will continue making an effort to bring his family forward and to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy carpentry tools.

loans.name: Muchungaji Group

texts.fr: La cliente Manegabe, femme dynamique  est présidente du groupe d’affaire Muchungaji. Mariée à un commerçant de la place, elle est âgée de 33 ans et mère de 5 enfants scolarisés. Elle sollicite ce credit pour acheter 67 casiers d’Amstel qui constitue son commerce. Elle souhaite agrandir son entreprise et construire une maison. Ainsi, elle remercie Hekima et ses partenaires.
texts.en: This client, Manegabe, is an energetic woman and the president of the business association “Muchungaji”. Married to a local merchant, she is 33 years old and a mother of five children provided with education. She is requesting this loan to purchase 67 cases of Amstel, which constitutes her commerce. She wishes to expand her enterprise and build a house. So, she thanks Hekima and its partners.

loans.use: to purchase 67 cases of Amstel

loans.name: Safia

texts.en:
Safia is a 45-year-old lady and she is the mother of three daughters and two sons. Her husband owns a workshop in which he provides services to maintain bicycles. He is a professional in his techniques and can easily fix the bicycles in no time. He has to use various types of tools for repairing purposes. 
A few days ago he moved his workshop to another location. Due to relocating some of the important and expensive tools have been misplaced.
Safia has requested a loan for her husband so that he would be able to compensate against this loss. He will buy repair tools, spare parts, tires, break shoes, etc. for the bicycle repair workshop. 
She wants to provide better education and living standards to her children. She is hopeful that her husband will utilize this amount in a positive way and his monthly income will be increased. She thanks Kiva and their field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy tools, spare parts, tires, and break shoes

loans.name: Asia

texts.en:
Asia is 42 years of age and the mother of six children, living in Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband owns a butcher shop in the market. He has been running his butcher shop for the last ten years. He is a very honest shop keeper and he behaves politely to people. His number of clients has been increasing due to his good attitude towards his clients. As the sole earner of his family, he wants to increase his income to be better able to meet his family's needs.

Asia's husband buys calves, cows and goats and sells the meat from his shop. He would also like to offer chicken to his customers. He wants to buy broilers and sell them in his butcher shop.

To improve his family's standard of living and for the development of his business, he needed a loan. His wife, Asia, contacted BRAC Pakistan, who issued her a loan to enhance her husband’s butcher shop. Asia is very thankful to Kiva and to BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to enhance her husband's butcher shop

loans.name: Christina

texts.en:
Christina is 34 years old and married with seven children, six of whom are in school. Christina works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

Christina has been in this business for 5 years. 

In the future Christina would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo and groceries

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase, beans, rice, oil and sugar.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for personal expenses

loans.name: Ibron

texts.en: Ibron is a kind and hard-working man. He was born in 1993. Ibron lives with his parents in the south part of Tajikistan and he is single. He is a student of the fourth course. Ibron is one of the best students. He likes all of the subjects he learns. Ibron often goes to the library and prepares for seminars. He must pay for tuition but he has no funds for tuition. He is asking for a loan of 1,600 USD to pay for tuition. He awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to pay for tuition

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en: Merlita manages her retail business, which is selling a variety of grocery items in her village. With her desire to help her husband improve their living conditions, Merlita is also helping him manage their fish business. They have their fish pond beside their house. They grow and care for 4,000 fingerlings in their fish pond. Merlita doesn’t want to deplete her store business capital to feed the fingerlings. Therefore, Merlita decided to take out a loan of 20,000 PHP to buy feed for the maintenance of her fishes and fingerlings. The loan will help her provide enough feed for her fish to grow faster.

loans.use: to buy feed for the maintenance of her fishes and fingerlings.

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es:
La Señorita. María forma parte del grupo de crédito María Reina de la Paz, le gusta su grupo porque siempre se ayudan en cualquier necesidad y los créditos le ayudan a salir  adelante y mejorar la estabilidad económica de su hogar. Vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, es una ciudad que tiene una riqueza arquitectónica y obras artísticas que le hicieron merecedora del nombramiento como Patrimonio Cultural del la Humanidad. 
La Señorita María tiene 34 años de edad y es soltera, vive en compañía de sus padres con quienes comparte los gastos de su hogar, la casa en la que vive es de sus padres.
Doña María es una mujer trabajadora que se dedica al comercio, vende puerta a puerta una gran variedad de cosméticos y bisutería, estas actividades le dan la oportunidad de mejorar su estabilidad económica y apoyar a su familia. 
Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cosméticos y bisutería. Su meta es crecer más en su negocio y  tener un local para vender.
texts.en:
The young woman Maria is part of the group Maria Reina de la Paz. She like the group because they always help her in whatever she needs, and the loans help her go forward and improve the economic stability of her household. She lives in the city of Cuenca, which is a city that is rich with architecture and artwork that have made the city worthy of the designation as a UNESCO World Heritage Site. 

Maria is 34 years old and is single. She lives with her parents, with whom she share the household expenses. The house she lives in belongs to her parents.

Maria is a hard-working woman who sells a wide variety of cosmetics and costume jewelry door to door. These activities give her the opportunity to improve her economic stability and support her family.

This loan will be invested in the purchase of cosmetics and costume jewelry. Her goal is to grow her business more and have a fixed location to sell her goods.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and costume jewelry.

loans.name: Viflor

texts.en:
Viflor is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell in her general store.

Viflor has been in this business for 8 years. She earns additional income from prepaid mobile phone loading. She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her business.

Viflor has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Yeng

texts.en:
Living in a rural village of the Prey Chhor district of Kampong Cham province, Yeng is a 40-year-old mother of five children, three of whom are in school. 

For the last 24 years, she and her husband have been farming rice to make a living. She can earn about 20 USD per day and can save about 9 USD of this after daily expenses.

Yeng has been with VisionFund for one cycle. She is now applying for another loan to buy a solar panel for lighting her home. She hopes this loan will enable her to have enough household supplies to support her family.

loans.use: to buy a solar panel for lighting her home.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Ruhiyya

texts.en: Ruhiyya is a 33-year-old married woman and she has two sons. Ruhiyya is a housewife and a farmer. Her husband is a taxi driver. They have been farming for four years now. They are currently growing watermelons and then selling their crops in the bazaar. Her monthly profit from this business is 160 AZN. Ruhiyya learned this trade thanks to her parents who taught her when she was young. She needs the loan to buy a water pump because now she has to get water from a neighbor. For this reason she is asking for a loan of 1,000 AZN. This is going to be her first loan. Ruhiyya appreciates your support.

loans.use: to buy a water pump

loans.name: María Beatriz

texts.es:
La Señora María forma parte del grupo de crédito María Reina de la Paz, se encuentra en este grupo desde hace 16 años, le gusta esta forma de créditos porque está formado por un grupo de mujeres que buscan que cada día las mejores oportunidades para salir adelante y tratar de darles una mejor vida a sus familias, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, es una ciudad que tiene una riqueza arquitectónica y obras artísticas que le hicieron merecedora del nombramiento como Patrimonio Cultural del la Humanidad. 
La Señora María tiene 48 años de edad, vive en unión libre y fruto de esa unión ha concebido 4 hijos, uno de ellos trabaja y le ayuda económicamente, su segundo hijo estudia en la universidad y sus dos últimos hijos quienes son gemelos están en un colegio de la ciudad, su esposo es de profesión artesano, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando. 
Doña María se dedica a la elaboración y venta de artesanías, como collares, pulseras y artículos de bisutería, este trabajo es su pasión y le gusta mucho. El dinero de su crédito va a ser invertido en la compra de materiales para bisutería.
texts.en:
María belongs to the group Credit María Reina de Paz. She has been in this group for 16 years. She likes this form of lending because it is based on a group of women, each seeking every day the best way to succeed and to provide a better life for their respective families. She lives in the city of Cuenca, a city that has rich architectural and artistic works, which earned its designation as a Cultural Heritage for Humanity. 

María is 48 years old and lives with her partner, with whom she was raised 4 children: one of them works and helps her financially, her second son is studying in college and her last two children, who are twins, are in public school. Her husband is a craftsman by profession. They don't own a home and rent instead.

María works manufacturing and selling crafts, such as necklaces, bracelets and jewelry. This work is her passion and she likes quite a bit. The money from the loan will be invested in the purchase of materials for making jewelry.

loans.use: buy materals for jewelry making.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a refresher course and certification

loans.name: Nicolas

texts.es:
Sololá se caracteriza por ser una ciudad bien poblada con casas muy bien estructuradas y modernas,  construidas con materiales muy sofisticada. El desarrollo socioeconómico ha sido un factor principal pero también la mano de obra por albañiles y constructores calificados como es el caso de Nicolas albañil de 38 años de edad con una familia de seis  hijos, los dos primeros hijos ya tiene familias separadas y los cuatro últimos son excelentes estudiantes de la escuela de su comunidad.

La actividad que el realiza es la albañilería el lleva realizando dicha actividad durante 10 años y se a convertido en una muy buena fuente de ingresos par el y su familia,  el es muy dedicado a su trabajo lo realiza de la forma más correcta y rápida para dejar las construcciones de su comunidad muy bien hechas.

El crédito que ha solicitado lo quiere utilizar para la compra de herramientas de albañilería para poder trabajar y realizar su trabajo con más rapidez y bien hecho, uno de sus sueños mientras corre el tiempo es convertirse en un maestro de obras y enseñarles a sus hijos el mismo oficio y que ellos estudien para que sean profesionales en el mañana.
texts.en:
Sololá is known for being a well-populated city with well-built modern homes, made with very sophisticated materials.  The socio-economic development has been a main factor, but also the work of the masons and qualified builders such as Nicolas.  He is a mason who is 38 years old.  He has 6 children; the oldest two children already have their own families, and the other 4 are excellent students who attend the local school.

Nicolas has worked as a mason for 10 years, and this activity has become a good source of income for him and his family.  He is very devoted to his work, which he does in the most proper and rapid way, leaving the buildings in his community very well-made.

The loan that Nicolas has requested will be used to buy bricklaying tools so that he can do his masonry work well and more quickly. One of his dreams is   to eventually become a master builder and teach his children the same trade, and have them study to become professionals in the mornings.

loans.use: to buy masonry tools

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.es:
Adelaida pertenece al banco comunal “LOS DIAMANTES” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. 
La socia sigue dedicándose al negocio de artesanía, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio  el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando  a su familia, la socia continua repartiendo du mercadería  a sus clientes que le solictan, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de aretes entre otros.
Adelaida Está muy agradecida con KIVA por el apoyo que le proporciona y por  ayudarla en el mantenimiento de su actividad, la cual representa el principal ingreso económico y sustento de su familia.
texts.en:
Adelaida belongs to the “Los Diamantes” (The Diamonds) communal bank in Cusco – Perú. 
She is still making her living selling handicrafts.  She has had her business for quite some time, and it has been going well for her thanks to the effort she puts into it each day.  Adelaida wants to keep working so she can continue supporting her family.  She is still delivering her merchandise to her customers who have placed orders, and that is how she is getting her family ahead. 
Adelaida is requesting the loan to purchase earrings, among other items. 
Adelaida is very grateful for the support KIVA has provided and for helping her to maintain her business, which is her family's main source of income and support.

loans.use: to purchase earrings, among other items.

loans.name: Lamdaria

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Lamdaria works hard to support her family.

She has a fish pond operator business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from buying and selling bananas and raising goats. Lamdaria is borrowing PHP 24,000 through NWTF to buy additional feed and pay for fish pond maintenance for her business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Lamdaria has been sustaining her business activities through her past 21 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional feed for her fish

loans.name: Aksanti Group

texts.fr: La cliente Feza est presidente du groupe de crédit Aksanti. Elle est âgée de 60 ans, mère de 9 enfants tous scolarisés et marié à un homme sans profession. Elle vend des assiettes en porcelaine et des bassins en plastique dans les différentes rues de la ville. Elle demande un nouveau prêt pour acheter 6 douzaines d’assiette et 2 douzaines de bassins. Elle a pour objectif l’agrandissement de son entreprise, l’alimentation de sa famille et la scolarité de ses enfants. Elle remercie Hekima de les soutenir.
texts.en: This client, Feza, is the president of the loan group  “Aksanti”. She is 60 years old and the mother of nine children, all provided with schooling, and she is married to an unemployed man. She has been selling porcelain plates and plastic tubs on different streets in town. She is asking for a new loan to purchase 6 dozen plates and 2 dozen tubs. Her goal is to expand her enterprise and to provide food for her family and schooling for her children. She thanks Hekima for supporting them

loans.use: to purchase 6 dozen plates and 2 dozen tubs

loans.name: Faraja Group

texts.fr: Madame Furaha presidente de l’association de crédit Faraja est vendeur de divers articles au marché central de Bukavu. Mariée à un vendeur, elle est âgée de 42 ans et mère de 13 enfants scolarisés. Elle sollicite un nouveau credit  pour acheter 20 sacs à main pour dame et 24 souliers hommes. Elle souhaite agrandir son entreprise et scolariser ses enfants. Ainsi, elle remercie Hekima et prie Dieu de le bénir.
texts.en: Ms. Furaha, the president of the loan association “Faraja”, is a vendor of a variety of goods at the Bukavu central market. Married to a vendor, she is 42 years old and the mother of thirteen children, all provided with schooling. She is requesting a new loan to purchase 20 women’s handbags and 24 men’s shoes. She would like to expand her enterprise and provide education to her children. So, she thanks Hekima and prays that God blesses it.

loans.use: to purchase 20 women’s handbags and 24 men’s shoes

loans.name: Allah Rakhi

texts.en:
Allah Rakhi belongs to a poor family. She lives with her spouse and eight children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband is a blacksmith; he manufactures iron accessories for doors and windows on houses. He has also been providing door-to-door services to weld broken iron accessories.

A few days ago, his welding machine went out of order due to overheating, and it needs to be replaced with a new one. He wants to buy a new welding machine but he does not have cash on hand due to a lot of household expenses.

Therefore, Allah Rakhi has requested a loan from BRAC Pakistan, an active field partner of Kiva, so that her husband would be able to buy a new welding machine for his business. Allah Rakhi thanks Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a welding machine for manufacturing iron accessories.

loans.name: Melixsa Mercedes

texts.es: Melixsa es una mujer dedicada a la enseñanza de los Jóvenes, de profesión Maestra de educación Secundaria, Labora en un colegio de una comunidad fuera de su lugar de habitación del cual se tiene que trasladar varios kilómetros para impartir sus clases, teniendo 13 años de ejercer tan noble labor, tiene una relación estable donde han procreado 1 hijo a quien le brinda todo el apoyo para su Desarrollo, actualmente tiene una necesidad de mejorar su situación personal, por eso tomo la decisión de visitar ceprodel para obtener un financiamiento el que utilizaría en Gastos Personales los que le vendrán a mejorar su situación familiar
texts.en: Melixsa is a woman who is dedicated to teaching young people; she is a high school teacher. She works in the high school of a community outside of the area she lives in so she has to travel various kilometers to give her classes. She has been doing this noble work for thirteen years. She is in a stable relationship in which she has had one son; she provides her son with all of the support he needs for his development. Currently she needs to improve a personal situation. For this reason she made the decision to visit CEPRODEL to get a loan that she will use for personal expenses to improve her family's situation.

loans.use: to pay for personal expenses

loans.name: Rocelyn

texts.en:
Rocelyn is 50-years-old and married with three children.

She earns a living by farming rice and corn in the Philippines. Rocelyn is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Rocelyn has been farming rice and corn for 6 years and also earns additional income from a general store and food vending.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Los Favorecidos Group

texts.es:
MARTHA mujer trabajadora de 30 años en unión libre con su pareja con quien tiene 2 hijos de 10 y 8 años. los niños asisten normalmente a clases. su compañero sentimental es ebanista y trabaja con su padre en un taller de muebles. MARTHA se dedica al hogar ella  cría pollos y vende ensaladas de frutas en la escuela en las horas de receso.
con el crédito que obtuvo hace un año- ella inició la actividad de cria de pollo y con el crédito actual comprará 200 pollos para continuar con esta tarea.
MARTHA espera tener en poco tiempo una pequeña vitrina frigorífica para poder ofrecer un producto mas fresco. en cuanto a los pollos espera crecer en numero y poder obtener mayores ganancias.
vive en una comunidad pequeña donde por fortuna cuentan con una escuela y los niños se sienten muy atraídos por el fútbol.
es el segundo crédito que este grupo gestiona y ven que su negocio crece poco a poco. agradecen la confianza que FODEMI ofrece a la gente de esta comunidad.
texts.en:
Martha, 30, is a hardworking woman.  She's in a common-law relationship with her companion, with whom she has two children, ages 10 and 8, who normally go to school.  Her companion is a carpenter who works with his father in a furniture workshop.

Martha's a homemaker who raises chickens and sells fruit salad at the school during recess.  She hopes to have a small refrigerated display case soon so she can sell a fresher product.  Regarding the chickens, she hopes to grow in size and be able to earn more profit.

Martha started her business raising chickens with the loan she got a year ago.  With the current loan she's going to buy 200 chickens to keep on doing this work.

She lives in a small community where they're lucky to have a school and where the children are drawn to soccer.

This is the group's second loan, and they see that their businesses are growing little by little.  They're grateful for the trust that FODEMI places in the people in the community.

loans.use: to buy 200 chickens and a refrigerated display case

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is married with two children and runs a general store while he husband works abroad for a living. She earns better income from her business that sustains their daily expenditures. To improve sales, she borrowed a new loan to purchase additional grocery products to sell. She joined GDMPC recently and with her membership, she has access to micro finance services of the cooperative. 

In the future, she wants to see her children's success and wants to improve the general living situation of the entire family.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery products to sell

loans.name: Franciscah

texts.en:
Franciscah is a married woman. She has 4 children. She describes herself to be committed. She operates a farm where she grows tea and bananas. She has been involved in this business for 5 years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are individuals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of finances. 

She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy fertilizer. Her business goal is to have more businesses within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will have a big tea plantation.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more maize to resell.

loans.name: Parvatham Shg - Valadi Group

texts.en:
Nesamary (wearing a yellow-colored sari, hand raised) and seven of her friends, Chitra, Rajeswari, Sarasu, Chitra, Bhuvaneswari, Annakamu, and Jayalakshmi, formed a group called ‘Parvatham’. All hail from Valadi village of Trichy in Tamil Nadu. Most of them are daily-wage laborers and help supplement their household income. 

These diligent women are unable to save money from their monthly income. A major chunk of their income goes towards buying firewood or kerosene, and a lot of their time is spent cooking over traditional ‘chulha’ stoves. These chulhas, apart from being time-consuming, also emit a lot of smoke, which plays havoc with their health. This adds to their medical expenses.

To tackle these problems, they have approached PAT (MicroGraam’s field partner) to buy Greenway cookstoves. The benefits of the Greenway cookstove are that it leads to fuel savings, uses all solid fuels, minimizes emissions of CO and CO2, supports fast and convenient cooking, is highly durable, and is maintenance-free and smokeless. The stove operates on all solid fuels, such as wood, agro-waste, charcoal, coal, and dry dung, and does not require any refurbishing or recurring cost. 

Hence, they are seeking a group loan of INR 1,400 each, which is repayable in easy installments. They intend to use the loan to purchase Greenway cookstoves. Your loan will help these women to have better health and also save a little more money.

loans.use: to buy a fuel-efficient cookstove.

loans.name: Janety

texts.en:
Janety is a married woman. She has 6 children. She describes herself to be determined. She operates a retail business where she sells firewood. She has been involved in this business for 15 years. Her business is located in a vibrant location and her primary customers are of all types. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of capital. She will use the KES 40,000 loan to buy more stock of firewood. 

Her business goal is to own a wholesale business within 5 years. This is her third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Her previous loan was repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to uplift her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of firewood

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
La socia Celia continua dedicándose al negocio de venta alimentos y bebidas en su restaurante, la socia  lleva buen tiempo con su negocio  el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando  a su familia. 
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos como aceite, arroz ente otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Our member Celia continues to dedicate herself to her business of selling food and drinks in her restaurant. She has had this business for a long time and things are going well, thanks to the effort she puts into the business each day. Celia is a responsible and enterprising person. She wants to continue working and to continue helping her family in this manner.

Celia is requesting a loan to purchase inputs such as cooking oil and rice, among other items.

Celia is grateful for the loan and she is committed to complying with her established schedule of repayments.

loans.use: buy restaurant inputs such as cooking oil and rice, among other items.

loans.name: Iris

texts.es:
La socia Iris continua con su labor como docente de educación primaria en una de las escuelas de la ciudad,  la socia  lleva buen tiempo con su trabajo  el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su trabajo, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando  a su familia. 
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de materiales didácticos.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member, Iris, continues with her work as a primary education teacher in one of the schools in the city. She has been doing this work for a good deal of time, and it is going well for her, thanks to the effort that she puts into her work every day. She is a responsible and hardworking person. She would like to be able to keep working in order to continue supporting her family.

Iris is requesting the loan for the purchase of educational materials. She feels grateful for the loan and she promises to comply with the established repayment schedule.

loans.use: to purchase educational materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stocks of clothes for resale.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is a married man. He has 2 children. He describes himself to be determined. He operates a retail business where he sells automobile spares. He has been involved in this business for one year. His business is located in a busy area. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of finances. He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stock of automobile spare parts. 

His business goal is to have a garage within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will have a better life.

loans.use: to buy more stock of automobile spare parts

loans.name: Anyelo Rafael

texts.es: Angelo es un joven estudiante de medicina, él solicita un préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos educativo, esta es su historia: Mi nombre es Ángelo tengo 21 años de edad y soy estudiante de Medicina en la Universidad Católica y Tecnológica del Cibao (UCATECI), vivo en la provincia La Vega.  Es triste pedir, pero más triste es malversar, por ello, es posible que en alguna ocasión nos veamos con la única salida de tener que solicitar ayuda por tal razón, me permito dirigirme a ustedes por este medio para solicitarle su valioso apoyo y comprensión, con el propósito de solicitarle una ayuda económica para terminar mis estudios, ya que mis posibilidades no son suficientes para cubrir los gastos y para mis padres tampoco. Mi padre trabaja como seguridad y mi Madre como conserje, por lo que no pueden ayudarme ya que sus salarios no son suficientes, por esta razón no me gustaría truncar con mis estudios, puesto que me gustaría realizarme como Médico y tener mayores y mejores oportunidades.
texts.en:
Angelo is a young medical student. He is requesting a loan to cover his educational expenses. 

This is his story: 

"My name is Angelo. I am 21 years old and a medical student at the Universidad Católica y Technológica del Cibao (UCATECI). I live in the province of La Vega."

"It is sad to beg but sadder to steal [popular saying]. Thus, it is possible that occasionally we may find ourselves with no option other than having to solicit help. For that reason, allow me to address you, hereby, to solicit your valuable support and understanding, for the purpose of requesting financial help to finish my studies."

"I do not have enough financial means to cover the expenses, and neither do my parents. My father works as guard, and my mother as janitor, they therefore cannot help me as their wages are not sufficient. I would not like to consequently give up my studies, since I would enjoy becoming a physician and having bigger and better opportunities."

loans.use: to cover his educational expenses.

loans.name: Racheal

texts.en:
Racheal, a married mother of four, describes herself as humble. For 10 years now she has been operating a retail business where she sells drinks and  foodstuffs. Her enterprise is located in a good area, and her primary customers are the general public. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of funds. 

Racheal will use this Kes 50,000 loan to buy more stocks of drinks and foodstuffs. Her business goal is to excel within five years. This is her second loan with SMEP Microfinance bank, her previous one having been fully repaid.

loans.use: buy more stocks of drinks and foodstuffs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy equipment for brick making

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
La socia Elizabeth continua dedicándose a  la venta de artesanía, la socia  lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando  a su familia. 
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de chompas de alpaca.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Elizabeth is still working selling handcrafts. She has been working for a long time in her business, and she is doing well because of her daily hard work. She is a responsible and diligent person who wants to keep on working so she can continue supporting her family. She is requesting a loan to buy alpaca sweaters. The member is grateful for the loan and she promises to meet up her loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy alpaca sweaters.

loans.name: Fredy

texts.es:
Fredy es una persona muy trabajadora, tiene 32 años de edad, es casado y vive en San Martin junto a su familia. Tiene dos menores hijos que son su mayor motivación en la vida, por quienes lucha día y noche para poder brindarles un futuro mejor. Es una persona que desde muy joven ha trabajado en la chacra, ahora que tiene su familia con mucho esfuerzo se ha comprado hectáreas de terreno y hoy se dedica al cultivo de cacao. Paralelamente trabaja como pescador artesanal y con esos ingresos cubre los gastos del hogar.
Fredy está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá realizar el mantenimiento respectivo de sus cultivos de cacao y así obtener mayores ingresos con las ventas. De esta manera podrá concretar el proyecto trazado que tiene: ampliar sus plantaciones de cacao.
texts.en:
Fredy is a very hardworking person. He is 32 years old and married; he lives in San Martin with his family. He has two young children who are his biggest motivation in life. He strives day and night to be able to provide them with a better future.  

Fredy is a person who has done farm work from a very young age. Now that he has his family, he has managed—with great effort—to buy hectares of land; today he earns his living growing cocoa beans. At the same time, he works as a traditional fisherman. With these incomes, he covers the household costs.

Fredy is very grateful to the Kiva lenders; with the support that they have provided, he will be able to carry out the maintenance of his cocoa bean crops in order to obtain greater income with the sales. This is how he will be able to realize the plan he has outlined: to expand his cocoa plantings.

loans.use: to maintain his cocao bean crop

loans.name: Nina

texts.ru: Нине 28 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей. У Нины среднее образование, по характеру, спокойная, целеустремленная. У нее хороший опыт в животноводстве и полеводстве, с 2007 года занимается откормом скота. Начала этот бизнес с покупки свиней на 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Нины, в хозяйстве имеется: 2 лошади, 1 свинья. Также есть земельный надел, мерою 1,20 ГА, где выращивают картофель, зерновые, эспарцет. Ее деятельность приносит около 8,000 сом (KGS) в месяц, что служит основой для покрытия расходов на питание и бытовые нужды семьи.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Нина обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 4 бычков. Доходы от кредита Нина планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства.
texts.en: Nina is 28, married, and the mother of two children. She has a high school education and is calm and dedicated by nature. She has good experience in raising livestock and planting crops, and since 2007 she has been fattening cattle. She started her business when she purchased pigs with 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to her hard work she currently has two horses and one pig. She also has a 1.2 hectare plot of land where she plants potatoes, grains, and sainfoin. She earns 8,000 som (KGS) per month, which is how she takes care of food and her family's needs. In order to expand her business Nina applied for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to buy four young bulls. She plans to use the profits from the loan to continue expanding her business.

loans.use: To purchase four young bulls in order to invest in her business

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
La socia Hilda continua dedicándose al negocio de comercialización de elementos de artesanía variada, la socia  lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando  a su familia. 
La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar bisutería y otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member Hilda continues working in the sale of various handmade products.  She has had a good amount of time in her business, which is going well thanks to the effort she puts into it every day.  She is a responsible and determined person, and wishes to continue this type of work to continue supporting her family.

She is requesting a loan in order to purchase costume jewelry and other goods to sell.  She is grateful for the loan and is committed to making the repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase costume jewelry and other goods to sell.

loans.name: Cinforosa

texts.es:
La socia Cinforosa continua dedicándose a la venta de comida en uno de los mercados de la ciudad del Cusco, la socia  lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando  a su familia. 
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de arroz, aceité entre otros.
La socia Cinforosa se siente agradecida con el apoyo brindado y por el crédito otorgado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de las cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Cinforosa sells food in one of Cusco's markets. Her business is going well thanks to the hard work she puts into it every day. She is responsible and hard-working. She wishes to be able to continue working and in this way support her family. She seeks a loan to buy rice, oil, and other items. Cinforosa is thankful with the provided support from the loan and she promises to make the established payments.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, and other items.

loans.name: Gohar

texts.en:
Gohar is a tailor. She lives with her husband and 19-year-old daughter in Yerevan town. 

Gohar, from her house, is tailoring bedding supplies. She works in a small room of her house. Realizing how important her business is for her family, Gohar would like to expand it. She wants to renovate the workshop and purchase a sewing machine. This will give her an opportunity to take bigger orders and provide better service to her clients.
