Felix como estudiante de postgrado en didáctica universitaria, busca la capacitación tanto intelectual como personal, obteniendo conocimientos y valores que le hagan crecer como persona para que de esa forma se pueda sentir útil para la sociedad. El proviene de una familia humilde pero con la convicción de poder salir para adelante es por esa razón que hace el esfuerzo de seguir capacitándose día a día y llegar a ser un profesional con el objetivo firme de iniciar un futuro de alguna universidad.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus gastos de titulación, ya que por medio de ello podrá cubrir ese gasto que tiene.
texts.en:
Felix is a postgraduate student studying at a teaching college. He is seeking training both intellectually and personally, obtaining both knowledge and values that are making him grow as a person so that he can feel of use to society.  He comes from a family of humble means, but the strong belief that he can get ahead is the reason he makes the effort to continue preparing himself day by day. This so that he can become a professional with the solid goal of beginning a future at a university.  

He is asking for this loan to be able to invest it in his tuition costs, since it is in this way he can cover this expense that he has.

loans.use: to pay for tuition and fees.

loans.name: Valentina

texts.en:
Valentina works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 19 years.

She requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the borrowed funds to purchase an additional stock of fish to sell.

In the future, Valentina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase an additional stock of fish to sell.

loans.name: Maysoun

texts.en: Because Maysoun is a conservative woman, she asked her daughter to take her place in the picture. Maysoun is a 38-year-old married lady living in Baqaa-Jordan. She lives with her family that consists of four members. Her daughter Alaa, who is appearing in the photo, is a university student majoring in Monument Science and she is in her third year. She is planning to start work after getting her Bachelor's Degree. Her mother Maysoun is seeking a loan to help her pay for her upcoming semester fee.

loans.use: To pay for her daughter's upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Jennalyn

texts.en: Jennalyn is studying for her Bachelor of Science in Business Administration at the university. She has two siblings who also need her parents' support. She believes that education is the best key to success and with this, she is hoping to find success in the future. She wants to become a successful businesswoman some day. Recently, she borrowed a new loan to pay her tuition fees for this current semester.

loans.use: to pay her tuition fees for this current semester

loans.name: Emprendedora De Los Cerezos Group

texts.es:
En la ciudadela Los Cerezos  de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito Emprendedora De Los Cerezos,  el cual está formado por 11 mujeres y 1 hombre que decidieron unirse tiempo atrás y formar este grupo de crédito el cual les va a ayudar a salir adelante en sus negocios. 
Una de las socias de este grupo es  la señora Jenny, tiene 45 años de edad, mantiene una relación de  unión libre y de esta relación ha tenido 4 hijos, dos mayores de edad, y dos de 15 y 13 años que estudian en colegio y escuela. El marido trabaja de profesor y en bus de transporte.
Doña Jenny es una gran ama de casa que para tener ingresos y con estos ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar desde hace dos años puso un negocio en su casa, ella tiene un depósito de venta de agua en bidón y en varias presentaciones, allí trabaja todos los días desde que amanece hasta la noche ya que su negocio lo tiene en su casa y a cualquier hora sus clientes necesitan comprar algo en su depósito,  sus hijos le ayudan en su negocio ya que ella también entrega a domicilio.
Este crédito lo va a utilizar en comprar agua en bidón y en varias presentaciones. Lleva más de 8 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos sale adelante. Sus metas son darles la mejor educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The "Emprendedora De Los Cerezos" communal bank meets every fortnight In the Los Cerezos citadel of the city of Portoviejo. It is composed of 11 woman and one man that decided to get together some time ago and form this communal bank to help them get ahead with their businesses.

Jenny is one member of this group. She is 45 years old, is in a common-law relationship and from this relationship has four children. Two of them are adults and the other two, aged 13 and 15, study at school. Her husband works as a teacher and drives a bus.

Jenny is a great housewife who in order to have income and help her husband with the household expenses opened a business in their house. She has a drinking water depot selling water in barrels and a variety of other containers. She works every day from when she gets up until the evening as her business is in her house and customers might need to buy something at any hour. Her children help her with the business as she also provides delivery to homes.

She will use this loan to buy bottles of water in various sizes. She has been in the communal bank for 8 years and she likes it as the loans help her to progress. Her goal is to provide the best education for her children.

loans.use: to buy water.

loans.name: Rosana

texts.es:
Rosana está en pareja, y es quien la ayuda a poder seguir sus estudios, ella es una persona que quiere ser alguien en la vida, y poder ayudar a sus seres queridos.
Rosana está estudiando la carrera de derecho, y comenta que quiere ser una abogada que pueda ayudar a las demás personas.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir los gastos de sus estudios, como materiales y fotocopias. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe y que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Rosana is in a relationship, and it is her significant other who helps her to be able to continue her studies.  She wants to become someone in life, and be able to help her loved ones. Rosana is studying law, and she says that she wants to be an attorney who will be able to help other people.

She is requesting this loan so that she can cover the costs of her studies, such as materials and photocopies. She is thankful for this opportunity that she is receiving, which will be a great help to her.

loans.use: to cover the costs of her studies, such as materials and photocopies.

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en: Mary Ann is studying for a Bachelor of Science in secondary education. She wants to have a job with good compensation in the future. She joined Gata Daku Multi-purpose Cooperative (GDMPC) and borrowed money to pay for her tuition fees for the current semester. She has always wanted to become successful to share with her family as well as their community.

loans.use: to pay her tuition fees

loans.name: Malak

texts.en: Malak is a 19-year-old single lady living in Rsaifeh, Jordan with her family that consists of five members. She is a Diploma student majoring in Nursing, and she is in her second year. Malak is seeking to get her Bachelor's Degree so that she will be able to get involved in the work environment. But she doesn't have enough money to pay for her upcoming semester fees. For that reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Guzal

texts.ru: Гузал верная жена и мама двоих детей. Ей 27 лет. Она с семьей живет на районе Дж.Расулова. Гузал около 6 лет занимается животноводческой деятельностью. Научилась ухаживать за скотами, когда вышла замуж, в семье мужа. Гузал также занимается земледелием. Она берет кредит и хочет увеличить поголовья скота и расширить бизнес. Гузал надеется, что животноводческая деятельность будет процветать и приносить хороший источник дохода, что позволить ее семье новые экономические возможности.
texts.en: Guzal is a loyal wife and the mother of two children. She is 27 and lives with her family in the J.Rasulov district. She has been involved in animal husbandry for about six years and learned to care for cattle from her husband's family. She also plants crops. Guzal is taking out a loan because she wants to increase her livestock headcount and expand her business. She hopes that her livestock business will flourish and become a good source of income, which will bring her family new economic opportunities.

loans.use: to expand her livestock business

loans.name: Santi

texts.en: Santi runs a small stall that sells mobile phones, mobile phone accessories, and mobile phone airtime credits, and provides utility bill payment service. Santi lives with her husband and their two children in Cianjur, a city located at the foot of Mount Gede-Pangrango, West Java. She was introduced to Ruma by one of Ruma staff who visited her stall and she quickly became interested in joining Ruma. Now she can process around 75-150 transactions per day.  As the business continues to grow, she hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva to enable her to process more airtime sales on the weekends. This loan would help her run the mobile airtime business and consequently support her plan to seek more business opportunities in the future. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone airtime credit and utility bill payment transactions on weekends

loans.name: Khatoon

texts.en:
Khatoon is 48 years old, married, and a mother of 2. Her son is a rickshaw driver by profession and has been driving his three-wheeled motorized rickshaw for a year, providing transportation services to the public. He transports his passengers to and from different locations within Lahore. He is a caring and supportive member of the family and helps his parents to pay for the daily expenses.

Khatoon's son needs to do maintenance on his rickshaw so that he does not have problems while he's working. He is very grateful to the Kiva lenders for helping him with the loan.

loans.use: to help her son pay for his rickshaw maintenance

loans.name: Nazirahan

texts.ru: Назирахан, 41 год, замужем, 2 детей. С 1992 года занимается животноводством, также имеет свой продуктовый магазин. На сегодняшний день Назирахан смогла развить свою деятельность, у нее есть 2 коровы, 10 овец, 3 лошади, и товар в обороте на сумму 15,000 сом (KGS). Есть 0,16 ГА земли, где Назирахан выращивает клевер и самостоятельно заготавливает сено для скота. Супруг активно и с удовольствием помогает по хозяйству. Ежемесячная прибыль составляет примерно 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса Назирахан обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку двух коров для разведения и увеличения поголовья скота. Назирахан является членом группы "Нурдан", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 4 человека. Доходы от кредита Назирахан планирует направить на расширение своего магазина.
texts.en: Nazirahan is 41 years old, married, and the mother of two children.  She has been involved in animal husbandry since 1992 and she also runs her own grocery store.  Having nicely developed her activity, she now owns two cows, ten sheep, three horses, as well as 15,000 som (KGS) worth of merchandise in her inventory.  In addition, she grows clover on 0.16 hectare of land and harvests her own hay for her livestock.  Her husband actively and willingly helps her with the farming business.  Nazirahan makes a monthly income of about 20,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, she has turned to the bank Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS).  She will use her loan to purchase two cows for breeding in order to increase her cattle headcount.  Nazirahan is a member of a group called "Nurdan" which comprises four additional members.  She plans to use her earnings from this loan to expand her grocery shop.

loans.use: to purchase two cows to further invest in the growth of her business.

loans.name: Victor

texts.en:
Victor is a father of one, residing in the expansive informal settlement of Mukuru, Nairobi, Kenya. He is a member of a local youth group that aims to point out issues facing the community. One of the main challenges highlighted in the group's meetings has been the lack of proper sanitation facilities. Victor took it upon himself to take a step further and look for possible solutions to this issue. He learnt about Fresh Life Initiative and was convinced that they were a perfect solution to the sanitation problem. 

Victor seeks a loan to help him purchase and run two Fresh Life toilets to be set up in Mukuru. He plans to assess the impact the toilets will have on sanitation standards and will encourage people to purchase more such facilities. He hopes to see a cleaner community and reduced exposure to the risk of contracting sanitation-related ailments.

loans.use: to purchase and run two Fresh Life toilets

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en:
Khaled is a 20-year-old university student majoring in business administration. He is in his second year. Khaled has always wanted to depend on himself financially. For that, he wants to get a bachelor’s degree to be able to start helping his family financially after he gets a good job in his field of study. 

As he doesn’t currently have enough money to pay for his upcoming semester fees, Khaled is requesting a loan.

loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Musab

texts.en:
Musab is a 20-year-old university student majoring in hospital management. He is in his first year which is the beginning of his study journey. Musab has always wanted to depend on himself financially. For that, he wants to get a bachelor’s degree to be able to start helping his family financially after he gets a good job in his field of study. 

As he doesn’t currently have enough money to pay for his upcoming semester fees, Musab is requesting a loan.

loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Anush

texts.en:
Anush is 57 years old and she lives in Vanadzor city of the Lori region. Fore more than 20 years, she has been running a small trading business selling women’s shoes in the city’s wholesale market. Anush has already become a devoted Kiva client and is planning her second deal with Kiva lenders.  She used her first loan to enlarge her stall’s product assortment. Anush has a big, nice family and lives with her husband, her son, her daughter-in-law, and two grandchildren. Her beloved husband helps her greatly with her business and together they bring merchandise from Yerevan city for her stall.  Anush’s younger son lives with his family in the Russian Federation. As Anush says, she is happy to help her son and provide her business income to sustain his family’s needs. 

Anush is requesting a 550,000 AMD loan to buy a new children's shoe collection for the autumn season. She hopes to have great sales for the beginning of the new school year. Anush will use the profit from her loan to provide a decent income for her family.

loans.use: to buy a children's shoe collection for the autumn season

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase tobacco.

loans.name: Nim

texts.en:
Nim is a 61-year-old widowed woman. She is a farmer and also a prahok vendor (prahok is salty fish kept in the jar for months and needs to be steamed to have with fresh vegetables). 

She has been a farmer since 1979. She lives with her three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. All of her children are workers. Together, they can earn approximately $19 per day. 

Now Nim would like to request a loan to buy a motorcycle for prahok vending in the nearby neighborhoods. This loan will help her earn more income in order to improve her living. In the future, she is going to expand her prahok selling and build a new house.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for selling prahok (salty fish) in nearby neighborhoods.

loans.name: Bolot

texts.ru: Болот, 40 лет, женат, имеет 4 детей. Болот в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав в 2005 году. Благодаря упорному труду Болота, на данный момент в его хозяйстве имеется 1 корова, 20 овец и 3 лошади. Ежемесячный доход составляет примерно 16,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Болот обратился в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 1 коровы и овец для разведения. Болот состоит в группе "Нурдан", в которой кроме него состоят еще 4 человека. Доходы от кредита Болот планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса и хочет закончить строительство дома.
texts.en: Bolot is 40 and married with four children. He has been working in animal husbandry and agriculture since 2005 as the primary source of income for his family. Thanks to his hard work, he now has one cow, 20 sheep and three horses, with a monthly income of 16,000 KGS. With the goal of further developing his business, Bolot has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 60,000 KGS to buy a cow and sheep to raise. He belongs to the group "Nurdan", which consists of himself and four other people. Bolot plans to put profits from the loan into further developing his business and wants to finish building his house.

loans.use: to buy a cow and sheep in order to be more profitable and finish building his house

loans.name: Teresa

texts.pt:
A dona Teresa tem 52 anos e viuva mae de 5 filhos dos quais apenas um estuda os restantes ja sao maiores de idade vive na casa propria.
Com o valor ira comprar areia, cimento, pedra para dar continuidade a construcao de sua casa de banho interna.
Para o futuro quer melhorar as condicoes de sua casa, crescer no negocio respondendo as necessidades de seus clientes.
O maior desafio e continuar a sustentar os estudos de sua filha ate ingressar no nivel superior, diz ainda que ira solicitar mais creditos para concretizar seus planos.
texts.en:
Teresa is a 52-year-old widow. She has five children, only one of whom is in school. The other children are already adults. She lives in a house that she owns.
With the loan she'll purchase sand, cement, and rocks in order to continue building her indoor bathroom.
In the future she wishes to improve her living conditions and make her business grow by meeting her customers' needs.
Her biggest challenge is to continue supporting her daughter's studies until she gets into college. She also states that she will apply for more loans so she can achieve her plans.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and rocks.

loans.name: Gulbarcha

texts.ru: Гульбарча, 37 лет, замужем, трое детей школьного и дошкольного возраста. У Гульбарчы среднее образование, с 2003 года в качестве дополнительного дохода занимается сельским хозяйством. У нее в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, 10 овец и 18 кур, также есть земельный надел размером 0,17 ГА, где она выращивает кукурузу. Также в сезон собирают яблоки, сливы, орехи для перепродажи. Гульбарча известна, как принципиальный, честный, порядочный и надежный человек. На сегодняшний день деятельность Гульбарчы приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 15,000 сом (KGS). Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 коров. Гульбарча является одним из 5 членов группы "Нурдан". Доходы от кредита она планирует использовать для развития своего хозяйства и намерена построить большой сарай для скота.
texts.en:
Gulbarcha is 37 and married with three young children. She has a high school education and has been working in agriculture since 2003 as a secondary source of income. She has two cows, 10 sheep and 18 chickens as well as a 0.17 hectare piece of land on which she grows corn. She also picks apples, plums and nuts for sale in season. 

Gulbarcha is knows as a principled, honest, decent and kind person. Her business currently brings in 15,000 KGS a month. With the goal of further developing her business, Gulbarcha has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 70,000 KGS to buy two cows. She is one of five members of the "Nurdan" group. She plans to put profits from the loan into further developing her business and intends to build a big livestock shed.

loans.use: to purchase two cows to expand her livestock business and build a barn for her animals

loans.name: Virgen Del Rosario Group

texts.es:
Este comité se llama “Virgen del Rosario” es un grupo de 17 mujeres que son muy bien organizadas, unidas, trabajadoras y solidarias unas con otras. Estas señoras son de la ciudad de Villarrica, todas son vecinas y amigas, se reúnen mensualmente para brindarse apoyo y ayuda unas a otras.
Maria es una de las integrantes, y además de eso es la presidenta del grupo, quien siempre trata de motivar a sus compañeras a que puedan luchar y crecer. Ella se dedica a la peluquería y comenta que le está yendo muy bien, ya que por medio de su trabajo tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar tijeras, peines, shampoo, enjuagues, etc., para que por medio de ello pueda seguir dando un buen servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en: This committee is called "Virgen del Rosario".  It's a group of 17 women who are very well organized, united, hard working and solidary with one another.  This women are from Villarrica and are all neighbors and friends.  They meet monthly to support and help each other.  Maria is a member and the president of the group.  She always tries to motivate her friends to work hard and grow.  She works as a hairdresser and mentions that everything is going very well for her since she's able to have the means to help her family through her work. She's requesting this loan to buy scissors, combs, shampoo, rinses, etc. to be able to continue giving a good service to her clients.

loans.use: to buy scissors, combs, shampoo, rinses, etc.

loans.name: Zhumagul

texts.ru: Жумагул 34 года, замужем, 3 детей дошкольного возраста. У Жумагул среднее образование. Она по характеру: спокойная, уравновешенная и трудолюбивая. В качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, уже много лет занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес 9 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду Жумагул в хозяйстве имеется: 3 коровы, 10 овец, а также есть земельный надел мерою 0,17 ГА, на котором она выращивает кукурузу. Ее деятельность приносит около 14,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Жумагул обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 10 овец. Жумагул является лидером группы "Нурдан", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 4 человека. Доходы от кредита Жумагул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства, а также, в будущем хочет купить машину.
texts.en: Zhumagul is 34, married, and has three preschool-aged children. She has a high school education and is calm, level-headed, and hardworking by nature. She raises livestock as her family's main source of income and started in the business nine years ago. Thanks to her hard work she currently has three cows, ten sheep, and a 0.17 hectare plot of land where she plants corn. She earns about 14,000 som (KGS) per month. In order to expand her business, Zhumagul applied for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) with the Bai-Tushum Bank to buy ten sheep. She is the leader of the "Nurdan" group, which has four other members. She plans to use the profits from the loan to invest in the continued growth of her farm and would like to buy a car.

loans.use: To purchase ten sheep in order to expand her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, rocks, and rods.

loans.name: Joao

texts.pt:
O senhor Joao  de 40 anos  é professor, em uniao marital vive na casa própria sem filhos ainda, sustenta seus pais enviando.
Com valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento, areia, pedra, varrões para a construção de sua casa 
Tem como projectos e sonhos terminar  a sua obra,  fazer um estabelecimento de venda de produtos na sua casa como forma de reforcar sua renda familiar, oficializar sua relacao casando.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros para a conclusao de sua casa, e quer mais um espaco para fazer uma casa maior pois o actual é menor e que irá solicitar mais empréstimos para concretizar seu plano
texts.en:
João is a teacher who's 40 years old. He's married and lives in a house that he owns, and he doesn't have children yet. He supports his parents.
With the amount of the loan he'll purchase cement, sand, rocks, and rods in order to build his house.
His projects and dreams are to finish the construction work, build a store for selling merchandise at home as a way of improving his family's income, and get officially married.
He states that the main challenges he has faced are financial, related to finishing his house. He wishes to obtain more space so he can build a bigger house, since the current space is smaller. He also states that he'll apply for more loans so he can achieve his plan.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, rocks, and rods.

loans.name: Bakisa

texts.ru: Бакиса, 37 лет, замужем, многодетная мать 5 детей. Бакиса в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством, стартовав в 1992 году с суммы в 3,500 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Бакисы в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 1 корова, 8 овец, 1 лошадь, также есть земельный надел, где Бакиса со своей семьей выращивают кукурузу. Бакиса является одним из 5 членов группы "Нурдан". В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 1 коровы для разведения. Доходы от кредита Бакиса вложит в расширение бизнеса и она хочет отремонтировать дом.
texts.en: Bakisa is 37 years old. She is married and has a large family: she is the mother of five. As a main source of income for her family, Bakisa raises livestock, having launched this business in 1992 with a staring capital of 3,500 KGS. Thanks to Bakisa's hard work, her farm at present includes one cow, eight sheep, and one horse; there is also a landplot, where Bakisa and her family grow corn. Bakisa is one of the five members of the Nurdan group. In order to develop her business further, she has applied to the Bai Tushum microfinance institution for a loan in the amount of 40,000 KGS to buy a cow for fattening. Bakisa plans to use the resulting revenue for a further expansion of her business. She would also like to renovate her house.

loans.use: to purchase a cow  for a further growth of her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, rocks, and rods.

loans.name: Gloria Concepción

texts.es:
Gloria de 56 años de edad, estudio hasta 3º grado, está casada y su esposo es agricultor, tienen 1 hijo que vive con ellos, él se dedica a la agricultura, además de ellos vive con su madre y una sobrina.
La señora desde su juventud se ha dedicado a la agricultura y aprendió porque su familia se ha dedicado a la siembra de maíz y frijol; comenzó sembrando pequeñas parcelas, ahora siembra 14,000 metros cuadrados de frijol y 7,000 de maíz a unos 20 minutos se va caminando y le ayuda su hijo.
El préstamo que está solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar abono, fertilizantes, veneno, herbicidas y además el pago del alquiler de las tierras donde sembrara 3,500 metros cuadros de maíz y 3,500 de frijol.
El sueño primordial es tener y contar con buena salud, para seguir trabajando y mantener a su familia, además espera contar con las condiciones favorables para el cultivo y poder generar las ganancias para seguir trabajando y mantener a su familia.
texts.en: Gloria is 56 years old and completed the third grade. She is married and her husband is a farmer. They have one son that lives with them. He makes a living by farming. In addition, she lives with her mother and a niece. Since her youth, Gloria has dedicated her life to farming and learned because her family made a living by planting corn and beans. She began planting small plots of land and now sows 14,000 square meters of beans and 7,000 of corn in about 20 minutes as she walks. Her son helps her. The loan she is requesting from CrediCampo is for purchasing compost, fertilizers, poison and herbicides and also to pay the rent for the land where she will plant 3,500 square meters of corn and 3,500 of beans. Her ultimate dream is to have good health and to continue working and supporting her family. She also hopes to have favorable conditions for cultivation so she can generate profits to continue working and supporting her family.

loans.use: buy compost, fertilizers, poison, herbicides and pay the rent for the land where she will plant 3,500 square meters of corn and 3,500 of beans.

loans.name: Hortencia Manhique

texts.pt:
A senhora Hortencia é mae viuva de tres filhos todos a estudar,  vive na casa propria e sustenta sua sogra apenas enviando.
Com valor do empréstimo irá comprar capulanas, saias, blusas juvetes para revender por encomendas.
Tem como projectos e sonhos fazer um murro  de vedacao de seu quintal e comprar uma viatura para uso pesssoal.
Diz que os principais desafios que tem enfrentado sao os financeiros para concretizar seus planos, e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar seu plano.
texts.en:
Hortencia is a widowed mother of three children, all of whom are in school. She lives in a house that she owns and supports her mother-in-law.
With the amount of the loan she'll purchase traditional shawls, skirts, blouses and other items so she can re-sell them on request.
Her projects and dreams are to build a fence wall around her yard and buy a vehicle for personal use.
She states that the main challenges she has faced are financial, related to achieving her plans. She also states that she'll apply for more loans so that she can achieve them.

loans.use: to purchase traditional shawls, skirts, blouses and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to fix his vehicle and to obtain capital to buy the material to later sell at the recycling location.

loans.name: Alphonsine

texts.en: Alphonsine is 32 years old. She is married with four children aged between one and nine. Two of them go to school. She has been making local beer from sorghum and selling it for five years. With the loan she would like to buy more sorghum for making local beer for sale. The profit from the business will be used to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy more sorghum for making local beer for sale.

loans.name: Umoja/kavumu Group

texts.fr: Madame Nzigire est trésorière du groupe de crédit Umoja/Kavumu. Mère de 7 enfants dont seulement 6 étudient, elle est mariée à un chômeur à l'age de 34 ans. Elle exerce ses activités de vente de farine depuis plus de 15 ans au marché central de la place raison pour laquelle elle sollicite un nouveau prêt pour acheter  3 sacs de semoule, 1 sac de sucre, 50kg de sorgho et 75 kg de farine de manioc. Son objectif est d’avoir un dépôt sur une route nationale. A cet effet, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien qu’elle apporte aux femmes pauvres économiquement actives.
texts.en:
Madame Nzigire is the treasurer of the Umoja/Kavumu loan group. She is the mother of seven children, six of whom go to school. Her husband is 34 years old and unemployed. 

She has been selling flour for 15 years in the central market. It's for this reason that she's asking for a loan for three bags of semolina, one bag of sugar, 50 kg of sorghum, and 75 kg of cassava root flour. Her goal is to open a stand on a national driving route. 

She thanks Hekima for the support they bring to economically active poor women.

loans.use: to buy three bags of semolina, one bag of sugar, 50 kg of sorghum, and 75 kg of cassava root flour.

loans.name: Gharam

texts.en:
Gharam is a 21-year-old university student majoring in Psychological Guidance, and she is in his first year. She lives in Ajloun-Jordan with her family that consists of five members. Her father is a retired man, and his pension isn't enough to cover his family's needs.  

Gharam is seeking to be independent by getting a good job that brings her good income. To do so, she needs to get her Bachelors’ Degree. Now she is seeking a loan to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Dairy farming is a profitable business venture in Kenya and has seen an upsurge in the recent past. Simon is 29 years of age and never wants to be left behind. 

Based in the rich Kisii highlands, he has been practicing mixed farming for the past 3 years. This loving and caring father of one earns a decent income through selling milk, eggs, and some personal business he engages in to make ends meet. Simon believes that to be a successful dairy farmer all he requires is a good breed of cow, quality feed, and advice from successful farmers. 

Since his childhood Simon has passionately loved dairy farming and this can be attested to the fact that he has nicknamed one of his cows “Nyarangi” (from a person’s name). Feeding and milking Nyarangi (the name of his cow) makes him very proud. 

Demand for milk in his area has been overwhelming and he has always wanted to buy another dairy cow to meet the demand. His biggest challenge is lack of funds to buy a quality breed of cow. Simon feels relieved that through institutions such as Juhudi Kilimo via Kiva lenders he can access loans and be able to make his dream come true. 

Simon plans not to just buy an ordinary dairy cow but he plans to buy an exotic breed of dairy cow that will be producing between 15-25 litres of milk a day. This will immediately translate to increased income and profit margins. Feeding of the dairy cow will never be a problem because he has planted enough Napier grass. 

Simon is a visionary farmer and plans that through profits from selling milk he will save more so that he can increase his milk selling business through producing yoghurt and cream. Other than profits, Simon stands to benefit from manure, which will help increase the productivity of his farm. In the long run, Simon is going to increase his income and save more and also improve his living conditions. His dream is to provide a secure future for his school going child.

loans.use: to purchase a quality dairy cow.

loans.name: Narine

texts.en:
Narine lives with her family in the village of Khotanan in the Syunik region.  She is 43 years old and a mother of three children. Her elder daughter is a student and her smaller daughter and son are still school-aged. Narine graduated from Kapan Pedagogical College and now she works at the village school as a teacher of elementary classes. The director of the same school is her husband. Besides her pedagogical occupation, she is also engaged in bee keeping. On her cute farm, she has 30 beehives and her farm is already famous for its pure and healing honey that she sells to her many regular customers. Narine copes with bee keeping very skillfully, despite not having any experience in this field and she wants to develop it now.

Narine needs a loan of 600,000 Armenian drams to purchase more beehives for her farm, and a special protective uniform for working with bees. She hopes to enlarge the production and sale of the honey from her farm.

loans.use: to buy more beehives and special protective uniforms

loans.name: Sopheap

texts.en: Sopheap is a 45-year-old married woman with two children. She sells wood, thatched roof and small bamboo trunks and she has been in this business since 1982. Her husband is 42 and works in an ice factory. One of her children is a student. All of them live in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. Together, they can earn approximately $12.50 per day. Now Sopheap would like to request a loan to buy a motorcycle with a trailer to use in her business. This loan will help her reduce transport expense and operate her business faster. In the future, she is going to expand her business and support her children to go to university.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle with a trailer

loans.name: Nematullo

texts.en: Nematullo is a young and energetic man. He is 19 years old. Nematullo is not married. He lives with parents. Nematullo is a student in his second course. He studies at the Medical University. Nematullo studies abroad. He studies well. Nematullo likes Chemistry, Physics and other courses. He is a very ambitions and kind young man. He must pay his tuition but he has no money. He is asking for a loan to pay for tuition. He awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To pay for tuition

loans.name: Sefasi

texts.en:
Sefasi aged 46 years is married with 7 children aged 25, 23, 22, 20, 18, 16 and 14 years. All her children attend school and three of them are at the university. 

She is dealing in tea growing having started the business in 2008. She started the business so she could have a clear source of income. Her clients are tea traders and factories. 

In addition to tea growing, Sefasi sells matooke to have a supplementary income to cater for her family's needs. She grows the tea in her rural area. She has applied for a loan to buy fertilizers for her tea farm. 

She is a very hard working and honest woman. This has helped her greatly to thrive in the market despite the challenges of the poor weather of the dry season. However, she hopes to be financially stable in the future.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizers

loans.name: Zhirayr

texts.en:
In the village of Tandzaver in the Syunik region lives Zhirayr. He is 51 years old and he lives with his retired mother, since he is divorced. Zhirayr graduated from Agricultural College and then he studied at the Goris City Pedagogical University in the faculty of Biology. For many years, Zhirayr didn't manage to work in his specialty, because he was engaged in different work in his village, but since 2003, he has worked at the village school as a teacher of biology. Simultaneously, he runs a farm and on his farm he has 4 cows, 2 bulls, 3 heifers and 15 chickens.  Zhirayar’s mother sells his farm products such as milk, meat and eggs from their house. 

Zhirayr is asking for a loan of 500.000 Armenian drams to buy fodder for his farm cattle and to buy two more heifers.

loans.use: to buy fodder for his farm cattle and buy two heifers

loans.name: Mutasem

texts.en: Mutasem is a 22-year-old university student majoring in Accounting and he is in his last year. He lives with his family that consists of seven members. Mutasem is planning to start work after getting his Bachelor's Degree and he is only one step away from that. He is now requesting a loan to pay for his upcoming semester fees so that he will be able to reach his aim.

loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: El Futuro Del Mañana Group

texts.es: Yolanda de 59 años de edad es viuda con 01 hijo independiente. Este es el grupo “El Futuro Del Mañana” conformado por 11 socios trabajadores y responsables,  la cual pasa a su 9vo ciclo. Ella se dedica a la venta de comida como el cebiche. Hace más de 03 años que cuenta con un restaurante, donde exhibe distintas variedades de platos típicos de la zona. Su mayor deseo es contar con un local propio ya que hasta el momento lo viene alquilando. Su último crédito los destinará para la compra de pescado, arroz, papas y verduras. El grupo “El Futuro Del Mañana” agradecen a las personas que hicieron posible este crédito. Yolanda se encuentra sentada, es la primera del lado derecho viste casaca negro.
texts.en:
Yolanda, who is 59 years old, is a widow with one adult child. 

This is the "El Futuro Del Mañana" [Future of Tomorrow] group, made up of 11 hardworking and responsible members; it is entering its 9th lending cycle. 

Yolanda earns her living selling food such as ceviche. For more than three years, she has had a restaurant where she exhibits different varieties of traditional dishes of the region. Her greatest wish is to own her own commercial space, since until now, she has been renting. Her latest loan will be destined for the purchase of fish, rice, potatoes, and vegetables. 

The "El Futuro Del Mañana" group thanks the people who make this loan possible. Yolanda is shown seated; she is the first one on the right side, and is wearing a black coat.

loans.use: to purchase fish, rice, potatoes, and vegetables

loans.name: Amire

texts.en:
Amire is 32 years old and married with two sons. She is an IDP (internally displaced person).  Her main source of income is agriculture (gardening). She grows fruit trees (pear, peach, apple, pomegranate, cherry and so on) and sells the fruit at the local bazaar. She has seven years of skill in gardening and gets 150 AZN for this.
 
In Azerbaijan, the demand for fruit is very high. During the whole year, they buy fruit for everyday use. They eat fruit fresh or prepare it in different, tasty and sweet dishes.

This is the first loan borrowed by Amire and it is for 1,000 AZN. Unfortunately, Amire’s income from gardening and pensioner isn’t enough to cover life's demands. That’s why she needs more money.  Her plans are to use this money to provide her children’s education and improve the family maintenance.

loans.use: to pay for her children's education

loans.name: Ararat

texts.en:
Ararat was born in the city of Kapan in the Syunik region.  Here he gained specialty as a cook and for many years he worked as a cook at a restaurant and made Armenian national dishes so delicious and so tasty. He is a very famous cook in his city and many restaurants are ready to hire him. Ararat, besides being a perfect cook, is also good farmer. In the nearby village of Sevakar he has a plot of land on which he cultivates vegetables such as beans, potato, cucumber, tomato, pepper, and also wheat.  As a cook he knows the necessity of using vegetables of high quality for cooking, in order to have healthy and tasty dishes. So he provides fresh and pure vegetables to his family, working on his land with great care and pleasure. 

Ararat is married and has two children. His wife does not work and she takes care of their house. This will be Ararat’s second Kiva loan, the first loan he asked in order to pay his son’s medical examination, for which is very thankful, since now his son feels good and healthy. Ararat says that autumn seasons are very busy and important months for every farmer; so he needs this loan amount in order to buy diesel fuel for wheat sowing activities and also fertilizer for his land.

loans.use: to buy diesel fuel for wheat sowing activities and also fertilizer for his land

loans.name: Rodelio

texts.en: Rodelio is 27 years old and is taking a Computer Programming course in St. Paul Colleges Foundation. He chose this course to easily get a job and help his parents. His parents cannot sustain his schooling because what they earn is not enough, so he wants to ask for PHP 10,000 in financial assistance from the KIVA lenders. He is hopeful that lenders will approve his loan for this will help him in achieving his goals.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition fee

loans.name: Basma

texts.en:
Basma is a 31-year-old single lady living in Madaba, Jordan, with her family that consists of six members. She has been helping her family financially by selling clothes and accessories at her house for four years. Her business was profitable, and she built a good customers base. 

She is planning to open an independent shop in the future to raise her income. To do so, she needs to expand her business and bring in good money by buying more clothes and accessories to sell, but she doesn't have enough money buy them. For that purpose, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to buy more clothes and accessories to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabric material for making trousers

loans.name: Elly

texts.en: Elly, age 36, is a married businessman selling general merchandise. He has 5 children who are 14, 12, 10, 8 and 6 years old and four of them attend school at the moment. He has done his business since 2009 in Nyakabirizi, Igara Bushenyi District. He started his business to be able to have a steady source of income and school fees for his children. He works eight hours a day and six days a week and his clients are town dwellers who have helped him to grow from one level to another. In addition to general merchandise, Elly also does produce but on a mobile basis from Kamwengye district to supplement his monthly income. His major challenge is competition from other businesspeople of the same category but he is determined to grow his businesses. He has applied for a loan of UGX 4,000,000 (four millions shillings) to buy general merchandise for his business. He hopes to educate all of his children for a better future.

loans.use: To buy corn flour, sugar. rice, and clothing among other items

loans.name: Hanifan

texts.en: Hanifan is 52, married and a mother of four children. Her son is a driver and drives a 3 wheeled rickshaw. He is a simple and responsible person. He works hard to make sure that he provides for all necessities of his family. Currently he needs to make some repairs to his vehicle and give it a routine service. For this reason, Hanifan has requested a loan through Brac Pakistan. She and her son are grateful to the Kiva lenders for their support, because the loan will allow him to carry out this maintenance and be able to carry on working.

loans.use: to cover the repair cost of her son's rickshaw

loans.name: Chanthuo

texts.en: Chanthuo is a 28-year-old married man and a driver. He has been a driver since 2012. He lives with his wife in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. His wife, 24, is a garment factory worker. Together, they can earn approximately $12 per day. Now Chanthuo would like to request a loan to buy farmland to cultivate rice. This loan will help him earn more income. In the future, he is going to build a bigger house with fences around.

loans.use: to buy farmland to cultivate rice

loans.name: Sol Y Luna Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SOL Y LUNA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Luisa ella es casada y tiene 57 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de productos de belleza y también la socia vende artesanía, la socia vende lápiz labiales, cremas y perfumes, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los productos de belleza. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cremas, lápiz labiales y perfumes.
El socio que esta tapado con un circulo su rostro ya no pertenece al banco comunal Sol y Luna.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de fotocopiadora, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the communal bank "Sol y Luna" (Sun and Moon). This bank is located in the district of Cuzco, which is part of the province and department of Cusco.

One of the members is Señora Luisa. She is married and is 57 years old. She has three children. She works in her business of selling beauty products, and she also sells handicrafts. She sells lipsticks, creams, and perfumes. She works from 8:00 am to 7:00 pm. She has already worked in this business for a number of years. Her dream is to have a shop where she can sell beauty products. She is applying for the loan to buy creams, lipsticks, and perfumes.

The member whose face is covered with a circle does not belong to the Sol y Luna communal bank.

The other members of the bank run a photocopying business, a grocery store, and a food-selling business.

This bank member is grateful to those who form part of this dream through this means, and she promises to make her payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy creams, lipsticks, and perfumes to sell

loans.name: Fouad

texts.en:
Fouad is a 47-year-old married father of two. He has been working in the transportation business since 2004. He used to work as a truck driver, but he decided to start his own business; thus the price of a van is more affordable to him than buying a big truck. He works in transporting people from his village to nearby villages, and he has a very good reputation in his domain and region.

His family's needs are increasing, so his acquired income isn't enough to cover his increasing family needs. Today, Fouad has to pay for his children's increasing education tuition fees, so he acquired a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, which will be invested in paying for his children's educational expenses.

He is working hard to provide them with the best education for a brighter future. He hopes that he can afford buying a truck which will improve his financial situation.

loans.use: To pay for his children's increasing school tuition fees

loans.name: Raul

texts.en: Raul wants to become a good teacher someday. He lives in a simple way of life with his family. Having seven siblings is not easy which is why he works and studies with effort and determination to become successful in the near future. Raul joined GDMPC and borrowed a new loan to pay his school tuition fees for the first semester.

loans.use: to pay his school tuition fees for the first semester

loans.name: Moses

texts.en: Moses is an old client who is growing tea, which he started in 2009. He is a married man with three children who are seven, five and two years old. Two of the children attend school at the moment. He is a hardworking man who works eight hours a day and six days a week. He started his business to be able to have a sustainable source of income to cater for his needs and the needs of his family.  The business is done in Nyakazinga, Igara, Bushenyi district and his clients are tea traders and factories. With his previous loan, his output increased and so did his profits and income. He is now applying for a loan of UGX 1,200,000 (One million Two hundred thousand shillings) to buy organic fertilizers for his tea plantation so that he can produce high quality tea and in the long run, make more profit and educate his children. His major challenge is poor weather in the dry season but he is determined to succeed through his hard work.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos es un hombre de 34 años de edad,  no asistió a la escuela ya que en ese tiempo los padres no veían como una prioridad el estudiar,  se acompañó su esposa es ama de casa tienen 5 hijos  todos viven allí en su casa y dependen económicamente de ellos, todos están esforzándose por estudiar y también trabajan en su tiempo libre.

Desde hace más de 10 años, aprendió a realizar trabajos de soldadura que le enseño un amigo y viendo que en la zona la demanda es alta, pero la escases de personas maestras en esta área lo llevaron a tomar la decisión de poder instalar su propio mini taller.  Además, trabaja la agricultura con sus hijos en tiempos que no trabajan en el taller,  trabaja todos los días fuertemente  buscando un desarrollo familiar y poder mejorar su calidad de vida poco a poco.

Con el préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar ácidos, hierro, pintura y equipo para mejorar su taller y realizar algunos trabajos que lo han buscado y carece de materiales necesarios para su elaboración y así poder ofrecer un mejor servicio y de mayor calidad.  

Él piensa a futuro tener un taller que ofrezca varios servicios y que las personas no tengan que viajar a otro lugar para realizar algunos trabajos y él aprovechar para no dejar las posibilidades de obtener ingresos. Que sus hijos se preparen academicamente y que aprendan a trabajar para que le ayuden a mejorar la casa donde viven y que todos estén felices de vivir en un lugar bonito, él está seguro que trabajando y con la ayuda de su familia saldrán adelante.
texts.en:
Santos is a 34 year old man.  He didn't get an education since at the time his parents didn't see school as a priority.  His wife is a housewife.  They have five children who all live in their house and depend on them financially.  The children are making every effort in school and also work in their free time.

More than 10 years ago, Santos learned from a friend how to work at welding.   Seeing there is high demand for this in his area and a scarcity of capable people has led Santos to decide to form his own small workshop.   Besides this,he works at farming with his children's help at times when he's not busy in the shop.  Every day he works hard trying to develop his family and be able to improve their quality of life little by little.  With the loan he is seeking, Santos will buy chemicals, iron, paint and equipment to improve his shop and do some jobs that people have sought.  He has lacked the necessary materials to do that work, and could thus offer better service, and one of higher quality.  

In the future, Santos hopes to have a workshop offering a wide variety of services so that people wont have to go to another place to get some jobs done, and he can take advantage of the chance to earn more.  He hopes his children will prepare themselves academically and learn to work so they can help him improve the house where they live, and that they will all be happy to live in a beautiful place.  He is sure that through his work and the help of his family they will get ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, metal, paints and equipment to improve his shop and carry out work that customers have asked for

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida is a 48-year-old married lady living with her family. Because of her love for children, she started running her own kindergarten since one year ago. She got her experience from working at other kindergartens in the past. This business has helped her in improving her family's living conditions. 

Now she is seeking to buy more children's chairs and teaching tools for her kindergarten to attract more customers and to be able to take care of more children. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For that purpose, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To buy more chairs and teaching tools for her kindergarten

loans.name: Hadeel

texts.en:
Hadeel is a 39-year-old married woman and a mother of three. Her husband works at mail administration in Jordan. 

She decided to help her husband in improving their living conditions by selling detergents and cleaning tools for two years. She is planning to expand her business in the future by opening an independent detergents shop. 

Now she needs to buy more cleaning tools and raw material to make more detergents in order to raise her profit and expand her business, but she doesn't have enough money to do so. For that reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to buy more cleaning tools and raw material to make more detergents and resell them

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy grocery products for resale

loans.name: Kijembe Group

texts.en:
Zaina, who is in her late 30s, is a widow with three children who are still at school. She has been running a general store for four years now. She works from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Zaina's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She will use this loan to restock the out-of-stock items in her general store. She dreams of making her store a supermarket.  

Zaina will share this loan with her loan group, "KIJEMBE," which consists of 11 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock the out-of-stock items in her general store.

loans.name: Shalom: Dios Con Nosotros Group

texts.es: Gldys de 21 años de edad es soltera. El grupo “Shalom Dios Con Nosotros” conformada por 07 mujeres emprendedoras que buscan mejorar cada día. Gladys se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir hace más 02 años. Con mucha dedicación a logrado salir adelante lo cual le permite apoyar a sus padres. Su mayor deseo de Gladys es contar con un local de venta por lo que lo realiza ambulatoriamente. Solicitó el crédito, para la compra de polos, camisas, pantalones de vestir y casacas. El grupo “Shalom Dios Con Nosotros” agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por darles la oportunidad de desarrollarse. Gladys se encuentra de pie, es la segunda del lado izquierdo y viste casaca guinda. En la parte superior a lado derecho se encuentra Exilda la cual no pudo llegar a tiempo por motivo de trabajo.
texts.en:
Gladys is 21 years old and is single. The group "Shalom Dios con Nosotros" consists of seven entrepreneurial women who seek to improve every day. Gladys has been selling articles of clothing for more than 2 years. With great dedication, she has managed to get ahead, which allows her to support her parents. Gladys' greatest desire is to have a sales shop, because she now sells as a walking vendor. She is applying for the loan to purchase polo shirts, shirts, slacks, and jackets. 

The group "Shalom Dios con Nosotros" is grateful to the Kiva investors for giving them the opportunity to develop themselves. Gladys is standing. She is the second one from the left side and is wearing a cherry-colored jacket. In the upper right of the photo is Exilda, who was not able to arrive on time because of work.

loans.use: to buy polo shirts, shirts, slacks, and jackets to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Didi

texts.en:
Didi is married, and he lives with his wife and his two children in Bandung, the capital city of West Java province. Didi runs a small stall that sells mobile phones, mobile phone accessories, mobile phone airtime credits, and electronic bill payment services. 

He joined Ruma because he’s interested in trying out selling mobile airtime and processing bill payments. As the business continues to grow, he hopes to get a working capital loan from Kiva to enable him to process more airtime sales on the weekends. This loan would help him in running the mobile airtime business and consequently support his plan to seek more business opportunities in the future. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone airtime credit transactions on weekends.

loans.name: Rawan

texts.en: Rawan is a 21-year-old married woman. She decided to help her husband in improving their living conditions by selling clothes for the past one year. She is planning to expand her business in the future by opening an independent clothes shop, and now she needs to buy more clothes in order to raise her profit and continue her journey, but she doesn't have enough money to do so. For that purpose, she has applied for this youth loan.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell

loans.name: María Marta

texts.es:
María de 46 años de edad,  no contó con la oportunidad de asistir a la escuela, sus padres no contaban con los recursos necesarios para mandarla a estudiar, también la escuela quedaba lejos y habían problemas por el conflicto armado que se dio; eso limito que pudiera estudiar. 

 Esta acompañada su esposo trabaja en la agricultura, tienen 3 hijos pero ninguno vive con ella, ya formaron su propia familia con ella solo viven 3 nietos quienes dependen económicamente de ellos.

Desde pequeña María aprendió con su madre lo que es el comercio de carnes provenientes del destazo de vacas y  cerdos siendo esta por ahorita su actividad económica en la cual lleva más de 15 años de venir realizándola, la que es bastante rentable y por tratarse de un producto alimenticio las personas lo consumen bastante, por lo cual las ventas son rápidas.

 Su esposo le ayuda en buscar al animal que van a destazar y a entregar los pedidos que le hacen 1 ves por semana.
 
El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar un cerdo para destazarlo y venderlo y buscarle ganancias que mejoren la calidad de vida familiar y así no perder la oportunidad de hacer negocio;  pues las personas ya saben los días que hay producto a la venta y siempre buscan y ella pierde de ganar cuando no tiene

Ella desea que sus tres nietos se preparen académicamente, que gocen de la oportunidad que ella no tuvo y que sus condiciones de vida sean mejores, también planea mejorar su vivienda y seguir trabajando para obtener siempre ingresos que le contribuyen a sufragar las necesidades de su hogar.
texts.en:
María is 46 years old. She did not have the opportunity to attend school, as her parents did not have the resources necessary to send her. In addition, the school was located far away, and there were problems related to the armed conflict that was underway; this limited her ability to get an education.

María is married, and her husband works in agriculture. They have three children, but none of them live with her, as they have already formed their own families. Only three grandchildren live with her and depend on her economically.

Since she was little, María learned from her mother how to sell meat from butchering cattle and pigs. For now, this is her economic activity; she has been doing this for 15 years. It is fairly profitable and since it's a food product, people consume quite a bit of it, so her sales are brisk.

Her husband helps her get the animal that they are going to butcher and deliver the orders, which they do once a week.

The loan that she is requesting is to buy a pig to butcher and sell, seeking earnings to improve her family's quality of life; this way she won't miss the opportunity to do business. People already know which days they have the product for sale and they always come looking for it, so she misses out on earnings when she doesn't have it.

She would like for her three grandchildren to be academically prepared so that they can enjoy the opportunities that she did not have, and for their living conditions to be better. She is also planning to improve her residence and continue working in order to keep earning income that will help defray the costs of household necessities.

loans.use: to buy a pig to butcher and sell, seeking earnings to improve her family's quality of life

loans.name: Fehmeeda

texts.en:
Fehmeeda is a 45-year-old married woman who lives in Rawalpindi with her family. She has six daughters and two sons. Given their large family, it is difficult to meet their expenses. Her husband runs a retail business selling a wide range of vegetables. These include potatoes, tomatoes, cabbage, green beans, onions, peppers, and peas. The business has been in operation for twenty years. According to him, the main business challenge is selling perishable products.

Fehmeeda has requested a loan to help her husband purchase crates of tomatoes, onions, beans and cucumbers. He says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow him to meet their family expenses and pay for their children's school fee.

loans.use: to help her husband buy fresh vegetables for reselling.

loans.name: Umar

texts.en:
Umar is 42 years old and lives in Rawalpindi with his family. He runs a shoe store and sells shoes to the local people in the community (ladies fancy shoes, gents and children's shoes). He has ten years of experience in this business. His wife stays at home, taking care of domestic work.

He is requesting a loan to buy a variety of rubber shoes, sandals, slippers and gents shoes in a large quantity. He will buy at wholesale prices so that he can run his business without worrying about inventory shortage. He wants to expand his business in the future and provide better living standards for his family.

loans.use: to buy more shoes to sell.

loans.name: Asia

texts.en:
Asia is a 34-year-old, hardworking woman with five children. For the last seven years, she has been providing a local service stitching clothes. She is quite popular for her stitching skills. Asia’s work brought the family out of a financial crisis that they were facing when she started working. Over the years, she has established a good clientele.

In her second loan cycle, Asia has requested 30,000 PKR to purchase a new stitching machine along with spools of threads and laces in different colors. Asia is very thankful for her previous loans and hopes that this loan will further diminish her family’s financial problems.

loans.use: to purchase a new stitching machine and spools of threads and laces in different colors.

loans.name: Rhusezanye Group

texts.fr: Madame Siyapata, mère de 5 enfants dont seulement 3 empruntent  le chemin de l’école est trésorière du groupe de crédit Rhusezanye. Agée de 55 ans, elle est Veuve.  Depuis 30 ans, elle vendait des cannes à sucre à partir de l’argent reçu de la vente de feuille de manioc. Aujourd’hui, elle sollicite ce nouveau prêt pour acheter 6 bassin/seaux. Elle a comme objectif de  pérenniser son entreprise.  Au final, elle remercie Hekima et souhaite que le soutien soit durable et ponctuel.
texts.en:
Mrs. Siyapata has five children, only three of which go to school. She is the treasurer for borrowing group Rhusezanye. At 55 years of age, she is widowed.

For thirty years, she had been selling sugar canes purchased with money earned selling manioc leaves. Today, she is requesting this new loan to purchase six buckets. Her goal is to ensure her business’s continued existence.

To conclude, she thanks Hekima, and wishes for support both timely and long-lasting.

loans.use: to purchase six buckets.

loans.name: Msakuzi Group

texts.en:
Sophia, who is in her early 40s, is a widow with two grown-up children. She has been a food vendor for 20 years now.  She works from 5 am until 4 pm daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.  

This will be her first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She will use this loan to increase her food stock.  She dreams of owning a hotel.

Sophia will share this loan with her loan group "MSAKUZI", which consists of five members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase her food stock.

loans.name: Farzana

texts.en:
Farzana is a 40-year-old married woman who has been running a business selling milk for many years with the help of her husband. She has three buffaloes for milking purpose. She sells the milk in her area. Her business is doing well enough to pay for her family’s expenses. She has four children. She is a dedicated mother and wants the best for her children. She uses most of the income to pay for her children’s health and education. 

This is her third year with Kashf Foundation. Now, she is requesting a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase one more buffalo for milking. She is hopeful that her business will expand with the help of this loan, and that she will be able to fulfill her dream of providing better living conditions for her children.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo

loans.name: Samina

texts.en:
Samina is a 40-year-old married woman. She has seven children. She is very skilled in the art of hand embroidery and has been using this skill for the last eight years to earn a living. She can make beautiful designs and patterns with her hands. Her skill is known throughout the town. S

Samina is in her sixth loan cycle and has requested a loan amount of 40,000 PKR. This loan will enable her to purchase more beads, thread, frames and other materials. This monetary help can take Samina closer to her dream of providing quality education for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more beads, thread, frames and other materials.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en:
Naseem, a 41-year-old married woman, runs a small boutique at home to provide for her family. She purchases cloth from the market at low prices, sewing and then selling the end products to the people of her locality. She always has a great product selection to offer, and she earns a good income that contributes to her family's well-being. 

For the improvement of her business, Naseem has requested a loan of 45,000 PKR to buy a greater variety of cloth and spools of thread, ribbon and lace in various colors. These purchases will allow her to fulfill the demands of her customers on time. With a good credit history, this will be Naseem’s sixth loan.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of cloth and spools of thread, ribbon and lace in various colors.

loans.name: Mussarat

texts.en:
Mussarat is a 26-year-old married woman and the mother of two children. She is trying hard to fulfill their demands, including food, health, clothing and education. She, along with her husband, has been working in agriculture for many years. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. 

In order to purchase different types of seeds with packs of insecticide and pesticide, Mussarat applied for a loan of 55,000 PKR. This will help her to grow more crops which will ultimately help in generating more cash.

loans.use: to purchase different types of seeds with packs of insecticide and pesticide

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El grupo “La Esperanza” está en su 1º ciclo del programa de comité de Mujeres Rurales, ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, a través del cual podrán conocer la situación de vida de cada una y conforme a ello poder trabajar por ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida.
Una integrante muy trabajadora es la Sra. Sergia, quien vender comidas de todo tipo, que ella misma hace, y que después sale a vender de manera ambulante, comenta que todos los días se levanta muy temprano a preparar las comidas que vende, y que a sus clientes gusta mucho.
Sergia pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos varios para su venta de comidas, como ser verduras, condimentos, aderezos, hortalizas y demás, de manera a poder seguir trabajando como lo hace Agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo de poder crecer y mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
The group “La Esperanza” (The Hope) is in its first loan cycle as part of the Rural Women’s Committee Program. The members have taken the poverty elimination survey so that each of them can become familiar with their life situation. As a result, they can work accordingly in order to improve their living conditions.

One hardworking member is Sra. Sergia, who sells food of all types. She prepares her dishes and then sells them as a street vendor. Sergia says that she wakes up early every day in order to prepare the food that she sells. Her customers greatly enjoy her food.

Sergia is requesting a loan in order to buy various supplies for selling her food such as greens, condiments, seasonings, vegetables, and other items. This will enable her to continue working as before. She is grateful for the opportunity that she has been given in order to grow and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy greens, condiments, seasonings, vegetables, and other supplies.

loans.name: Baraka/kavumu Group

texts.fr: La cliente Ntakwinja est presidente de l’association d’affaire Baraka/katana. Actuellement vendeuse d’huile de palme, il ya plus de 3 ans de cela elle fut cultivatrice avant l’avènement de Hekima.Agée de 50ans, elle est mariée à un homme sans travail et mère de 7 enfants  dont seulement 5 étudient faute de moyen.Elle sollicite ce nouveau crédit pour acheter 13 bidons d’huile.  Son objectif est d’asseoir son activité et ainsi,elle remercie Hekima pour ce geste de générosité à l’égard des femmes entrepreneurs.
texts.en:
The client, Ntakwinja, is the president of the Baraka/katana business association. She currently sells palm oil. She was a farmer for over three years until  she learned about Hekima. 

She is 50 years old and her husband is unemployed. She has seven children, but can only afford to send five of them to school. She is asking for a new loan to buy 13 jugs of oil. 

Her goal is to settle down in her business. She thanks Hekima for this generous gesture toward female entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy 13 jugs of oil.

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina is a 37-year-old widow. She is a mother of four children and is living in a joint family system. In order to meet her household expenditures, she started selling animals. Currently, she has four goats. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. 

Amina needs to further improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied a loan of PKR 55,000 to purchase more animals. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level. She is in her eighth loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase more animals.

loans.name: Kunduz

texts.ru: Кундуз 40 лет, не замужем, мать 3 детей школьного возраста. У Кундуз - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается торговлей головными уборами на центральном рынке города. На сегодняшний день имеет товар в обороте на 150,000 сом (KGS). Ежемесячный доход составляет около 25,000 сом (KGS). Накопленные средства Кундуз старается вкладывать в развитие и расширение бизнеса. Кундуз обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сомов (KGS) на покупку канцелярских товаров с целью их дальнейшей перепродажи в своем магазине на рынке. Она считает свою задумку выгодной, так как перед началом учебного года спрос на канцелярские товары очень высокий.  Таким образом, она увеличит доходы от бизнеса и направит прибыль на покупку автомобиля для семьи.
texts.en:
Kunduz is 40 and unmarried with three school-aged children. She has a high school education and sells stationery and other goods at the central city market as the primary source of her family's income. Her total working capital is 150,000 KGS, and her monthly income is about 25,000 KGS. She tries to put money she earns back into developing and expanding her business. 

Kunduz has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 KGS to buy school supplies to be sold in her shop at the market. She believes it's a good time to do this since the school year is beginning soon and there is a lot of demand for these goods. In this way she will increase profits from her business and be able to put money toward buying a family car.

loans.use: to buy school supplies for resale in order to be more competitive and expand her business

loans.name: Dusanure Group

texts.fr:
Josélyne fait partie du groupe  Dusanure et  habite à  Bujumbura. Elle a 37 ans et est mariée à Denis ,un maçon. Ensemble ils ont 3 enfants âgés de 5 à 9 ans dont 2 étudient.
 

Elle fait le commerce de  riz  depuis  10 ans. 

Elle est à son douzième  crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de riz  à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait être une importatrice et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Josélyne is a member of group Dusanure, and lives in Bujumbura. She is 37 years old and married to Denis, a bricklayer. Together they have three children aged 5 to 9; two of them attend school.

She has sold rice for ten years.

This is her twelfth loan with Turame. With the loan granted by Kiva, she will increase her capital and buy a large quantity of rice, which she will resell to earn more.

In the coming years, she would like to import and to see her children go to school.

loans.use: to increase her capital and buy rice in bulk to increase profits.

loans.name: Catarina

texts.es:
Las calles de Suchitepéquez es testigo de los colores más vistosos impregnados en las blusas, cortes y fajas típicas.  Es imposible que cualquier turista deje de admirar este producto, pararse y hacer una buena compra de ello, es la actividad que Catarina realiza de 51 años de edad soltera que cuenta con cuatro hijos por los cuales está decidido a luchar por la vida y abrir nuevas puertas hacia el futuro, los primeros dos hijos ya tienen familia propias y los dos últimos son excelentes estudiantes de la escuela de la comunidad.
	
La actividad que ella desempeña es la elaboración de güipiles, cortes y fajas típicas, ella viene realizando dicha actividad durante 20 años ella ha venido realizando un gran esfuerzo para poder elaborar sus actividades de la mejor calidad y diversos estilos para poder atraer a más clientes para tener un mejor ingreso económico para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.

El uso respectivo que ella le dará al crédito es para la compra de materia prima como hilos de diferentes colores y otros insumos que se requieren en la elaboración de su actividad para poder tener un ingreso económico. Uno de las grandes aspiraciones de Catarina es ver que sus hijos se convierten en profesionales en los diferentes campos laborales y agrandar más su negocio para así tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
The streets of Suchitepéquez are witness to the most eye-catching colors permeating the traditional blouses, skirts, and sashes. It is impossible for any tourist to resist admiring these products, stopping, and making a good purchase of one. This is the activity that Catarina does at the age of 51. She is single and has four children, for whom she is determined strive for life and open new doors for the future. Her oldest two children already have their own families, and the two younger ones are excellent students in the school in the community.

Catarina's business is making güipiles (traditional blouses), traditional skirts, and sashes. She has been doing this work for 20 years. She has been making a great effort to be able to make products of the best quality and in various styles in order to be able to attract more customers and to have a better income to improve the living conditions of her family.

The use that she will put the loan to is to buy raw materials such as threads of different colors and other supplies that are needed for her products so that she can have an economic income. One of Catarina's great aspirations to see her children become professionals in different areas of work and to expand her business more so that she can thus have better earnings.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make traditional clothing.

loans.name: Natividad

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KOSÑIPATA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Maranura, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Natividad  se dedica al negocio de cultivo de frutas y agricultura, la socia tiene un terreno donde cultiva platanos,cafe,mandarinas y naranjas, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su terreno de cultivo. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Natividad is a member of the communal bank "KOSÑIPATA", which is located in the district of Maranura in the province of La Convención in the Department of Cusco. Natividad is a fruit grower and farmer, she has land where she grows plantains, coffee, mandarins and oranges. She works every day from 6 a.m. until 5 p.m. She has been in this business for many years and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to expand her growing land. She requests the loan to purchase seeds and fertilizers. Natividad is happy to be receiving the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer.
